first time I stay in this hotel. a decent place, very nice breakfast, big lobby.

judul_review: “Hotel Dengan Nuansa Asri Di Tengah Kota”
deskripsi: Hotel lama tetapi masih sangat terawat, dengan kamar yang luas dan bersih. Lokasi BF indoor dan outdoor dengan kualitas masakan yang bagus/enak dan sangat bervariasi.
mantap mantap mantap mantap

Saya sudah sering parkir di hotel bumi karena kantor pusat kerja saya ada disebelah hotel bumi. Setelah benar2 menginap disini, memang benar2 hotel bintang 5 dan kualitasnya jg bintang 5. Sekarang tempat ini jadi opsi menginap keluarga kami untuk menghabiskan weekend..
Mantap. Lokasi, kebersihan, teduh sekali di dalam, ruangan kamar meski agak old fashion tapi terawat baik.  Yang membuat anak saya suka ada jacuzzi air panas, jadi bisa berendam seharian di sana.
Semuanya memuaskan, rencana akan menginap lagi di sini. Terima kasih Bumi City Resort
Fasilitas lengkap, staff ramah, lokasi strategis, menu breakfast variatif dan enak terutama mie goreng dan nasi goreng jawa nya

Harga terjangkau
Breakfast nya ada ciri khas tersendiri, saya suka.
Fasilitas lengkap
Hotel lama

Kekurangan:  pertama check in dpt kamar 1952.. meja, lampu penuh debu.. gelas2 kotor  (saya tlp CS dan mrk cek sendiri akhirnya dipindah ke kamar 1957  bersih .. saya suka)
Menginap selama 4 hari .. setelah pindah kamar overall saya suka👍.
Mskpn respon nya agak lama.

Nb: sblm menempati kamar lebih baik d cek dulu, karena maklum hotel lama dgn fasilitas dan harga terjangkau ditengah kota.
Suasana nyaman dan strategis, pilihan makanan banyak , kebersihan baik, menyenangkan utk keluarga.

Masuk lobby langsung semerbak bau rempah2, bagi yang suka, fine fine saja.  Bagi yg ga terbiasa, jadi ga nyaman. Pilihan makanan waktu breakfast berlimpah, buanyakk, sampai susah cari tempat duduk, mungkin krn high season. 
Kamar OK luas, sayang untuk twin bednya kasurnya kecil bukan ukuran 120. jadi pas tidur sama anak rada sempit

book kamar : clasic room luas 42 m,,bener luas, ranjang tipe king size, ac dingin, ranjang empuk, kamar mandi dengan bathtub, dan shower yg terpisah, cuma ukuran tv nya harus lebih besar dengan ukuran kamar yang besar seperti ini, untuk breakfast: model buffet dengan tradisi lokal, makan di tengah taman rindang, menu banyak, chinese food-indonesian food - west food, lumayan enak, bisa request nasi goreng jawa/bakmi jawa dimasak langsung jadi lebih fresh,,,,,kolam renang ada di lt 3', cukup lah buat renang2 hapi,, komplit ada jakuzi kecil sesudah renang bisa rendam dulu (39'c) sebelum bilas, yang senang itu bau rempah2 sereh di area lobi ,, jadi fresh rasanya,, untuk yang bawa mobil bisa lapor ke reseption biar daftar supaya tidak kena charge selama parkir,,,dekat kalau ke mall tunjungan , atau minimarket ,, nyaman di tengah kota....

cocok untuk para pelancong dari surabaya dan sekitarnya maupun dari luar surabaya,
hotel ini menghadirkan suasana yang istimewa di tengah hingar bingar kota surabaya,
suasana tenang damai bisa membantu kita melupakan sejenak beban pikiran para kaum urban.
lengkap sudah dengan sajian yang lengkap dan indonesia banget.
aroma serai yang selalu melekat di hati,.
menyenangkan, sarapan lengkap, kamar nya bagus
menginap 2 malam di sini lantai 19 dapat free upgrade room... kamar luas ... tempat tidur king size ...  sarapan mantap banyak varian menu kalau ke surabaya pasti balik lagi

Sy beberapa kali menginap di hotel ini dan selalu puas! Kamar luas. Bathroom luas, Shower dan bathub terpisah. Ameneties lengkap. Ada buah selamat datang. Swimming pool ada 2, ditambah 1 jacuzzi air panas. Ada 2 lapangan tennis dan area yang luas untuk olah raga pagi, disamping fitness center. Menu breakfast nya luar biasa! Sangat variatif dan banyak sekali variannya. Serasa makan di kafe, baik indoor maupun outdoor nya. Outdoor nya nuansa taman2 di bali/jawa. Walau hotel lama, tapi kesan bintang 5 nya masih terjaga. Our favorite hotel in Surabaya!

Sy beberapa kali menginap di hotel ini dan selalu puas! Kamar luas. Bathroom luas, Shower dan bathub terpisah. Ameneties lengkap. Ada buah selamat datang. Swimming pool ada 2, ditambah 1 jacuzzi air panas. Ada 2 lapangan tennis dan area yang luas untuk olah raga pagi, disamping fitness center. Menu breakfast nya luar biasa! Sangat variatif dan banyak sekali variannya. Serasa makan di kafe, baik indoor maupun outdoor nya. Outdoor nya nuansa taman2 di bali/jawa. Walau hotel lama, tapi kesan bintang 5 nya masih terjaga. Our favorite hotel in Surabaya!

Lokasi, suasana resor, bfast buffet dengan suasana pasar yang mantab, kamar yang masih terawat baik. Ukuran TV termasuk kecil untuk jaman sekarang, tapi tidak terlalu berpengaruh kalau hanya untuk istirahat sebentar.
Lokasi OK. Ini sudah yg keempat kali nya menginap di hotel ini. Paling favorit makanannya, oke semua 👌

Kamar luas, terawat, dan khas 5 stars hotel. Breakfast sangat variatif dan enak, restaurantnya juga sangat bagus baik indoor maupun outdoor nya. Lokasi sangat strategis. Ada 3 pool, salah satunya jacuzzi kecil dengan air hangat, hanya air tidak terlalu bening saat sy menginap, mungkin sedang saatnya diganti. Ada 2 lapangan tennis yg bisa digunakan, fitness center. Hanya tidak ada kids club.
Tempatnya strategis, lingkungannya asri, makanannya tradisional beud hehehehe. Good lah!!
Dari beberapa kali ke Surabaya, Bumi Surabaya City Resort yang selalu saya pilih karena kamarnya nyaman dan breakfastnya enak.
Tempat tidur tidak sebanding dengan harga , kebersihan kurang, Breakfast tidak enak,Minta sesuatu responnya lama

semuanya memuaskan
pilihan terbaik tempat refreshing
hotel yang oke

judul_review: “1 malam di Bumi Surabaya city resort”
deskripsi: Breakfast yg mantaaab...pemandangan malam kota yg indah...
Nyaman,bersih,staf yg ramah dan breakfast nya beraneka macam pilihan dan respon cepat,kemana2 dekat
ukuran kamar luas sekitar 42 m2, taman bagus dan teduh
Staff ramah, kamar luas, breakfast banyak pilihan. Memuaskan
hotel yang bagus.. berbeda dengan hotel lain.. suasana nya enak dan lokasi di tengah kota... semua nya bagus.. yang disayangkan pada waktu breakfast, peralatan makan yang diberikan kurang bersih
Menginap disini semalam, staff ramah..pelayanan juga memuaskan..breakfast byk bgt variasi menunya dan enak2...kamar luas..ad bathtubnya...overall puas stay disini...
Hotel yg menyenangkan, dng fasilifas yg lumayan bagus dan lengkap. Resto all you can eatnya buat dinner, recomended
Breakfast variatif dan enak.staf ramah,layanan baik,hotel tenang dan nyaman.kolam renang bersih,tidak ada yg mengecewakan
Walaupun hotel tua, fasilitas sangat lengkap dan staf sangat ramah. Cekatan setiap tamu membutuhkan bantuan. Ditambah lagi dapat harga super good value for money dari agoda. Thank you Agoda!
enak , strategis , tengah kota, makanan enak bgt
staff ramah, kamar bersih

Kelebihan :
_kebersihan selalu terjaga
_kamar & kamar mandi luas
_breakfast sgt bervariasi
_sangat tenang utk isthr
Kekurangan : 
_kurang koordinasi antara cafe dekat lobby dan resto arumanis, saat sy ingin lunch sembari ngopi, staff cafe bilang gak bisa krn beda administrasi dan tdk berusaha utk membantu order lunch di arumanis.. pdhl kali pertama menginap , staff arumanis sgt membantu shg sy bisa lunch sembari ngopi di cafe lobby... akhirnya sy memutuskan utk lunch di luar hotel, sayang sekali..
Pengalaman berkesan kali ini :
_hp suami tertinggal di cafe krn kami buru2 utk lunch di luar, br tersadar saat diperlukan... suami menelpon hotel , staff cowok bilang hp disimpan.. hebat nya saat bertemu staff cowok tsb menolak utk diberi tips dg sikap sopan... Trimakasih bumi surabaya berhasil mendidik staff dg sgt baik.. hp suami memang tdk material tp data yg tersimpan yg sangat berharga utk kami.. thanks bumi surabaya

judul_review: “Lokasi bagus,fasilitas bagus,sayangnya waktu itu dpt staff yg agak gak ramah”
deskripsi: Overall hotel ini recommended banget & saya selalu nginep di sini utk liburan dengan keluarga. Dari segi kamar bagus banget,besar,bersih dan kamar mandinya ada bath tub dan shower. Sarapannya sangat sangat variatif dan enak banget. Sayangnya pengalaman saya kemaren agak kurang nyaman dgn staff di resepsionis yg lambat sekali utk check out,saat itu bukan saya saja yg mengeluh tp banyak customer merasakan hal yg sama. Resepsionisnya ada 4 loket tp hanya berfungsi 2 loket saja. Udah gitu mbak resepsionis yg sedang mengurus check out saya sering digangguin staff lain yg nanyain dokumen lah,minta bantuan apa lah,saya sampek gemes sendiri liatnya gak selese2 niy proses check outnya. Udah gitu waktu saya mau drop anak saya yg tidur di mobil ke lobby,saya minta bantuan dr staff lobby depan malah diajakin becanda bukannya membantu saya cari solusi.Lokasi parkirnya di belakang dan lobby drop off di depan,resepsionisnya masih jalan lagi jauh dan itu menyulitkan saya yg bawa 2 anak kecil yg tidur
Menu breakfast kurang variatif, dan staff yang kesannya kurang ramah (senyum, salam, sapa, jarang dilakukan) tp cukup membantu.

judul_review: “Hotelnya bersih, kamarnya luas, pilihan makanan saat breakfast sangat beragam”
deskripsi: membuat anak-anak saya betah, dan ingin bermalam disana lagi
Hotel yg sangat nyaman..kamar bersih kamar mandi juga bersih dan harum..makanan enak dan bervariasi

Hotel Bumi sdh menjadi langganan saya untuk tinggal apabila ada business trip di kota Surabaya. Hotelnya nyaman dengan kebersihan dan kualitas yang baik. Ambiencenya jg bagus untuk lokasi tdk menjadi masalah krn di pusat kota.
Hotel pilian utama kalo ke surabaya, pilian makanan byk terutama menu tradisional, sayang kasur dah agak keras
Ini hotel bangunan lama dengan interior klasik tapi tetap nyaman, lokasi dekat tunjungan plaza

Plus :
1. Kamar luas dan bersih
2. Pegawai helpfull
3. Lingkungan sgt tenang dan nyaman utk isthr
4. Breakfast sgt variatif
5. Black coffee nya juara
Minus :
Karpet kamar dan interior mungkin sdh waktunya di up grade agar lbh kekinian
Hotel berkelas, juga nyaman buat anak". Makanan enak dan sesuai selera, banyak pilihan. Kolam renang dan gym ok juga.

judul_review: “Kamar bersih,nyaman dan tenang,ada taman buat refresing,sarapan enak dan menu bervariasi ”
deskripsi: Kelebihan: Harga sesuai fasilitas bintang lima                    Kekurangan:Jauh dari Mall
Semuanya baik kecuali AC agar diperbaiki, cooling capacity ditambah atau unit lama diganti
pokoknya mantap bumi surabaya tetep di jaga

kami sekeluarga sudah berkali-kali menginap di hotel bumi. pertama menjadi alasan kami karena luas kamarnya yang cukup menampung keluarga kecil kami. kedua lokasi yang sangat strategis berada di jantung kota surabaya. keramahan staf juga titik pertama, meski waktu pertama kali menginap staf restoranya kurang membuat nyaman kami, pada saat sarapankan pagi kita di pelototin, setelah kami komplain ke resepsionis sdh beberapa kali menginap dengan hari dan bulan yang sama beruntun kami tidak menemukan petugas itu lagi. entah di pidah tugaskan atau seperti apa saya tidak mendapat berita yang pasti. pokoknya kalau datang ke surabaya dan bermalam saya anjurkan ke hotel bumi surabaya.

judul_review: “Salah satu hotel yg memiliki keunikan tersendiri...”
deskripsi: Memasuki hotel ini ada kesan sejuk di tengah kota Surabaya yang panas. Staff ramah, terutama resepsionis bernama mba Leni. Hotel ini terkenal dgn taman dan tema pasar malam resto Arumanis, jadi sempatkan waktu utk berkeliling atau dinner karena pencahayaan yang menarik. Kamar mmg tampak tua, tapi nyaman dan cukup bersih hanya ternyata ada beberapa semut kecil di meja dan tempat tidur. Karena check in malam dan lampu kamar yg remang2, saya baru memperhatikan hal tsb keesokan paginya. Breakfast buffet banyak pilihan dari tradisional, asia, dan continental. Yang enak adalah nasi goreng yg dibuat by request, jamu temulawak, wedang rempah, tahu kek, quiche, bread pudding. Oh ya lobby hotel ini wangi lemongrass dan itu adalah ciri khasnya. Over all, hotel yg menyenangkan.
Kamar hotel yang nyaman dan bersih.  Sarapan pagi yang banyak variasinya dan enak.

judul_review: “Resort di Tengah Kota yang patut dipelihara”
deskripsi:
ni adalah kunjungan kami yang kedua, saya memilih tempat ini karena pengalaman menginap yang lalu sangat menyenangkan. Sayangnya kali ini kami dapat kamar dengan layout sudut yang terasa lebih sesak, namun kamar mandinya mendapat cahaya matahari langsung, mengurangi rasa kecewa saat kami baru tiba di kamar kami. 

Breakfast tetap tak terkalahkan, pilihan menu yang beragam dan lokasi di taman yang rindang membuat niat kami untuk beristirahat dimulai dengan santai dan menyenangkan.
Sayangnya pelayanan room service agak lambat, mungkin saat itu sangat padat. Permintaan kami di hari pertama (handuk extra) tidak ditanggapi, sementara permintaan di hari terakhir (piring extra) baru datang setengah jam kemudian. 

Namun hotel ini tetap menjadi akan menjadi pilihan kami, karena rasanya sulit mencari resort semacam ini di tengah kota.
karenanya, akan sangat disayangkan bila hotel ini menjadi kurang terawat kebersihannya. Tentu sulit untuk memperhatikan tiap detil, tapi standard yang ditawarkan adalah bintang lima, sehingga sebaiknya hal kecil seperti window blinds diperhatikan kebersihannya.
Window blinds di kamar mandi sangat berdebu.
Good
Sangat menyenangkan...sy tdk sempat breakfeast...tapi dikasih box utk breakfeast...krn cek out jam 5 pagi...
lancar namun berharap western food agak banyak pilihan. terutama kalau membawa tamu dr eropa yg rewel dg rasa asia.
Nyaman

Saya menginap untuk mendapatkan suasana baru di malan tahun baru 2014. Dan hotel bumi menyediakan segalanya melebihi ekspektasi saya. Hotel yg mewah, suasana asri, kolam renang yg oke, makanan yg enak. Andai ada wifi semakin komplit.

Kamar dan kamar mandinya luas. Kolam renangnya nyaman sekali, sejuk karena terlindung oleh tingginya gedung. Menu breakfastnya cukup beragam, ada juga makanan tradisional yang menggoda selera. Tetapi sayangnya hanya berlaku untuk 2 orang dewasa, dan anak kecil harus membayar lagi. Di hari saya menginap, ada maintanance PLN dimana listrik digantikan oleh genset dari jam 9-1 siang. Sayangnya perpindahan dari listrik ke genset tidak smooth, sehingga ada jeda cukup lama tanpa listrik. Bepergian dengan anak kecil dibawah 10 tahun, mereka cepat merasa tidak nyaman saat listrik mati. Ditambah saat naik lift, sempat tertahan sekitar 3 menit didalam. Memang tidak lama, tetapi cukup membuat takut karena ada anak kecil. Overall saya menikmati kunjungan saya ke hotel Bumi, dan ke depan akan mengagendakan lagi menginap disini.
bagus hotelnya, halaman luas, dan parkiran luas, banyak restoran di dalamnya
Hotel ini terbaik yang pernah saya kunjungi selama disurabaya, selain harganya tidak mahal tapi fasilitasnya dan kenyamanannya sempurna.

judul_review: “Ukuran kamar yang luas dan harga yang reasonable”
deskripsi:
Menginap disini bukan yang pertama buat saya dan saya memilih menginap disini karena lokasi, kamar yang luas dan harga yang reasonable. Disamping itu suasana hotel yang tenang meskipun lokasinya berada di tengah kota juga menjadi salah satu alasan saya memilih hotel ini.
Yang perlu diperhatikan adalah, layanan internet via wifi di kamar adalah free tetapi tidak free apabila menggunakan kabel LAN. Saya sempat bersitegang dengan office desk pada saat check out karena ada tagihan internet dimana tidak pernah diinformasikan diawal apabila menggunakan LAN adalah berbayar. Alasan saya menggunakan LAN karena WIFI dikamar nyambung putus terus dan akhirnya mereka bisa menerima dan akhirnya tidak di charge ke saya.
Hotel yang megah,nyaman, interior yang bagus,staf yang ramah,cocok untuk wisatawan bisnis

deskripsi:
Hotel dengan nuansa alam yang sangat indah.

Hotel memiliki taman yang sangat nyaman di tengah kota.
Kamar terasa lapang dan menyenangkan, meskipun ada anak yang ikut menginap.
Kualitas layanan masih tinggi, sama dengan layanan dari manajemen hotel yang lama (Hyatt Surabaya), dimana kita selalu mendapat jawaban dan senyuman pada setiap pertanyaan.
Pilihan tempat untuk makan malam juga lengkap, sampai makanan tradisonal pun tersedia.

judul_review: “hotel yg sangat sesuai dengan kebutuhan saya”
deskripsi: meskipun hotel ex hyatt, namun fasilitas hotel ini msh tetap mengimbangi dgn hotel terdahulunya
Cocok untuk pertemuan bisnis karena lokasi yang mudah dijangkau

Kamarnya bersih dan rapi, taman di hotel bagus.

Tetapi perabot di kamar sudah lama dan perlu di renovasi.

Internet tidak gratis, dikenakan biaya yang relatif mahal.

kami puas menginap di hotel bumi surabaya ini.
menu breakfast juga banyak variasinya.
berada dalam tengah kota, jadi dekat ke pusat perbelanjaan
kamar yg cukup luas dan bersih, karyawan yg ramah, dan suasana hotel yg cukup tenang. perlu diperhatikan tempat tidur yg terlalu empuk sehingga bangun pagi badan terasa pegal
saya menginap 1 malam, dan saya puas dengan pelayanan hotel dan lokasi yang tepat berada di pusat kota, sangat dekat dengan pusat perbelanjaan.

Lokasi hotel yang strategis menjadi salah satu faktor utama dalam menentukan hotel mana yang akan saya pakai, selain itu pelayanan dan fasilitas yang diberikan hotel. Tersedianya fasilitas yang lengkap dan dapat di handalkan membuat saya nyaman dan percaya dalam melakukan transaksi bisnis di surabaya. Lokasi yang berada di tengah kota, dekat dengan pusat pemerintahan dan perbelanjaan sehingga memudahkan saya dalam menjalin komunikasi dengan para relasi.

judul_review: “Hotel letak strategis dan cocok untuk family”
deskripsi: Hotel ini sangat cocok bagi keluarga yang memiliki anak-anak, karena memiliki pool yang luas. Kamar yang kami tempati sangat luas, namun interior kamar sedikit usang.Lokasi sangat dekat dengan Plaza Tunjungan.

The hotel used to be under the Hyatt group. Now it is under local management. 
The room and the bathroom were clean. Since it is one of the first 5-star hotels in Surabaya, the room was big/spacious and all rooms had bathtubs. They only provide 2 towels in the room with no face and hand towels. When we asked for an additional towel, there was an additional cost for an additional towel. This could be a problem if a family with one kid stays in the hotel. Perhaps, the hotel management can limit each room can ask for one or two additional towels with no extra cost. 
The hotel staff were very nice and kind.
The foods had big improvement from last year. This year they were delicious. One thing that needs improvement from the kitchen staff is they need to refill the spoons, forks, and glasses faster.

We have been staying for 4 nights  this early November 2022. The food is great, even though some 90% are the same every morning, 10% of them changes, some different jelly, bread, soup (rawon, soto, ...). 
They are some Indonesia specialty from bubur, pecel, gado2, rawon, soto. fried rice, friend noodle, .. and some internationals like small sausage, a couple chinese cuisines, bread, jelly, salad, omelet, .. The coffee is great here.
The room shows the age but still very functional and the greatness of a 5 star hotel in the past. I asked them to replace the toilet seat since the surface was peeling in a few places and fixed the safety box. They did it right away! However, everything else is perfect, huge drapery, huge room, great bed, clean carpet, clean bathroom (shower and bath tub), a  special counter for the baggage. 
The front desk, room service, breakfast service, ...and all are very courteous and prompt. Thank you!
Very close (5 mins driving) to all you want to do for shopping and dining! Very close to the famous Rawon Setan restaurant and Tunjungan Plaza 1-6

Berikut contoh review untuk hotel bintang 5:




Saya baru saja menginap di Bumi Surabaya selama 3 malam dan sangat puas dengan pelayanan yang luar biasa! Fasilitasnya super mewah dan nyaman, mulai dari kamar yang luas, kasur yang empuk, hingga kolam renang yang indah.

Pelayanan staf sangat ramah, profesional dan selalu siap membantu. Mereka membuat saya merasa seperti di rumah sendiri. Sarapan pagi juga sangat lezat dengan berbagai pilihan menu.

Lokasinya strategis, dekat dengan pusat kota dan tempat-tempat wisata populer. Sangat cocok untuk liburan keluarga atau kunjungan bisnis.

Saya memberikan rating 5/5 dan sangat merekomendasikan [Nama Hotel] kepada siapa saja yang mencari pengalaman menginap yang tak terlupakan.

Ulasan Singkat
- Fasilitas: 5/5
- Pelayanan: 5/5
- Lokasi: 5/5

Spent one night at this hotel as I was travelling for work. Great service by the staff from check in to check out. Room was spacious and clean. Only thing I could comment on is the breakfast buffet spread. It was not up to what I would expect from a 5-star hotel. The Japanese dishes could've been forgone with and no one would have noticed. They could've also had more local dishes other than soto, Indomie and nasi goreng. But overall it was a good stay.

Hotel tua yang terawat, fasilitas yang kurang hanyalah smoking area yang ditengah taman dimana banyak nyamuk dan bila hujan kehujanan. Ada yang dekat lobby, dan restoran tapi hanya buat yang belanja di cafe shop atau restoran. Padahal kita check in setelah makan siang dan mau tidur masa pesan makanan dan kopi. Seharusnya tamu hotel diperkenankan nunggu kunci di smoking area dekat lobby tanpa wajib memesan kopi atau makanan.

Saya pesan 2 kamar connecting, kamar 1 sudah siap jam 13 (good point) kamar sebelah katanya sedang di service. Tapi sampai jam 15 kita cek ke sebelah, masih belum di bersihkan, tidak ada staff yang membersihkan, sampai kita telp ke bawah baru dikirim cleaner. Harusnya kalau ada tamu order connecting sesegera mungkin dipersiapkan kamar sebelahnya.

Breakfastnya? Biasa saja rasanya, hanya variasinya cukup banyak saja.

The hotel was great, the rooms were large and clean, the equipment was not very new but clean and comfortable, the pool downstairs and breakfast were excellent, and best of all, the staff were friendly, I would be back again

Long story short, it's a nice hotel. 

Perfect spot because it's in the middle of the city. The staff were super friendly. Breakfast was full of choices so you definitely won't get bored. Gym area was clean and well maintained. The swimming pool is big enough. 

What i like the most is the atmosphere. It's in the middle of the city, but feels like you're not. Because you're surrounded by trees.

I'd absolutely stay in this hotel again.

The hotel is beautiful, the bed had crisp, clean linens, and the breakfast buffet had diverse, delicious choices. A bit more attention could be paid to cleanliness, especially anywhere there’s glass (shower, windows, pictures on the wall, etc) and the carpets in the halls and rooms are a bit worn and appear dusty. All the same, we would certainly stay here again as the pros outweigh the cons!

This hotel is an old hotel, one of the first 5-star hotels in Surabaya. Since it is no longer under the Hyatt group, looks like the standard is not as high as the Hyatt. The new management still tries to maintain a high standard, but we can see some areas are still lacking for example the cleanliness and facilities. The breakfast is OK, although it needs some improvements in terms of taste and presentation. The coffee and tea station is great. The salad perhaps must be provided separately between each vegetable's contents, so we can choose the contents of our salad. The staffs are very nice and friendly. Overall it is a very good hotel to stay in. I would definitely come back again to stay at this hotel.

My first visit to the hotel was dinner buffet last year, it was amazing experience but sadly I found their spread this time is not as amazing as last year visit
 The hotel even quite old but the facility is good, I have everything I need, their pool is extraordinary. I just feel a but uncomfortable when I did check in that in other hotel I used to end up add another night this time I just want to go home. Different with  check in my out experience was more pleasant, the restaurant manager was really nice the staff though need more a cheerful training 
...all and all for 5 stars I think they could do better because I just had a 4 star experience in Yogyakarta and it was amazing

judul_review: “Good location, good vibes need improve in variety of breakfast selection”
deskripsi:
Is my second time choose the hotel Bumi Surabaya amongst the other 5* hotel in surabaya. 
Used to Hotel Hyatt Bumi but currently is managed ownself by Bumi. The Hyatt ambiance is still reflected on some point. 
Actually lobby is good, full of sunlight but in the hallway, the carpet looks dull, need refreshment in the carpet
Room is huge but the brightness level inside the room is need to improve.
Tv is old fashioned, not a smart tv. Doesnt have youtube, netflix or other
Location of power outlet is minimalist, and need to add

Internet speed is so so. And some area have blank spot.

The variety of breakfast selection is really need to improve, my highlight: the butter is on the big block, cut pieces per pieces and put in the jar
I suggest you to use personal butter,

No selection of cheese

The 5* hotel but only have fresh milk, no choice of almond milk, low fat milk, chocolate milk please

I think the juice is, not a fresh juice

Indonesian menu that served in buffet inside the arumanis during the breakfast is need to improve

Stayed 2 days in normal room
19 floor very nice room 
Staff very nice in restaurant 
Reception staff little lazy 
All other staff very very good 
Food excellent at breakfast lots of variety 
Tasted good also
Breakfast in excellent location
In Garden 
Just local people so nice 
Stay here families for weekend getaways 
I will come back again as I live in Bali
5 star hotel 3 star price
Excellent value 
Cannot find this type of package anywhere 50 USD includes breakfast for 2 .
100% great

In my career traveling and working for companies all over the world I have stayed and literally thousands of hotels around the world and none of the hotels can compare to Bumi Surabaya hotel. The hotel does not treat you just ask and occupant but treat you as a family member. If they allowed more stars I would give it more. The staff the service the cleanliness of the room, I could go on and on but by now you should get the point. Bumi Surabaya hotel is truly the best

Despite the hotel is being old, overall we had really nice experience staying here. They could've done better at cleaning the sheets and towel. Other than that, everything else is perfect. Their breakfast has so much variety. Clean swimming pool and environment.

My family is kind of regular guest in this hotel, since more than a decade. What we love is the spacious room and good breakfast.
However the facilities may need to be improved and the breakfast varieties and quality may also need to be restored back to what it had a few years ago.

judul_review: “Perfect staycation for couple qith a child in the middle of the surabay a city ”
deskripsi: The hotel is very good for staycation the palce was nice random choices of food. The pool ambiance hotel room itself. Is so perfect for you to rest Bd spend your holiday.

judul_review: “Great hotel at the best location BUT run down condition”
deskripsi:
This hotel has a great memory in my life. Since 35 years , so many events happening , family dinner gathering and wedding ceremony. Looks the hotel like this remains all the great time before. Hope it can be rejuvenice and become a good hotel that will be an icon in the future.
However, our stay is good and memorable .
This place is a time capsule. Classic indo holiday vibes with a touch of extravagance. Incredible architecture, location, and cleanliness.
Amazing place to stay right in Midtown. The location is super convenient, and the atmosphere is so comforting. Perfect for a relaxing getaway or a business trip. Highly recommend!
Wonderful stay, clean, spacious room

Every time I back to Surabaya for business always stay at this nice hotel. Very comfy , staff very helpful and friendly, very value of money…
For sure will back again on next visit

judul_review: “Room is a bit too old. Need some renovation.”

Great facility and even greater staffs. Breakfast in the middle of lush green is truly enjoyable.
Strongly recommended
Strongly recommended

Setiap kali berkunjung ke keluarga atau bermain di Surabaya.
Keluarga saya selalu memilih hotel Bumi.
Karena ssmua fasilitas lengkap dan ada.
best place to stay in the heart of the city
The best!
Everything is really good
Excellent service from their staff, but sadly their jacuzzi not open everyday even in the weekend. Breakfast with many choices and the taste is okay

Resume of staycation experience:
4 thumbs up for bumi surabaya city resort

1. They charged 100k for parking car. Car park very far from the lobby. 
2. My son is 3 years and during breakfast my son vomit and sick. We want to ask to take away some eggs and rice for my son due to sick. But the staff seems not happy and lil bit rude to us. They think we want to steal some eggs and rice. Come on, your foods also not recommend to eat. We only need egg and rice for my son because of sick. And you know its idul fitri holiday and none resto open at this day. Will not stay here anymore.

Great hotel indeed
Very great

Thank you for the awesome hospitality Hotel Bumi

will surely be back to Bumi Surabaya.
the only thing that we found very odd, the waitress at the breakfast asked if we need anything, we said yes, can i get... but he never came back. unsure if he even understood what we wanted. i think, if you don't mean to ask, just smile. it will be okay. we are used to help ourselves anyway.

Hotelnya bersih,nyaman,luas,staff ramah.

it's a good place for having a quality time with friends. it's a good commodation for stay within 1-2 days. the staff there was so nice and helpful.

nice stay at this hotel, nature vibes, great breakfast, nice pool with views. recommended for family with kids, room is spacious. the minor is just parking lot dark at night, and the hotel abit old fashioned, a few of modern touch at the room willbe nice.

yeah maybe this hotel looks overpriced, but now common sense, food and room is 5 stars. Hotel location is the center of city, well that's help me a lot.

I just recently stayed at Bumi Surabaya hotel for 28 days, and as always it was a wonderful enjoyable experience. Everything there is excellent from the facility, to the staff. Very professional and willing to do anything to make your stay enjoyable. It's not staying in a hotel it's like staying with a family at home. I wholeheartedly recommend Bumi Surabaya hotel.

Hotel ini terletak di pusat kota Surabaya, akses dekat untuk ke salah satu Mall terbesar di surabaya, untuk harga beserta kualitas kamar, fasilitas dan pelayanan sangat woth the money. Anak-anak saya sangat senang menginap disana. bakal jadi rujukan tahunan bersama keluarga. Sukses selalu agoda dan hotel bumi surabaya.

Staff nya byk yg jadi pajangan alias diem aja😂 sebenarnya hotelnya bagus dan luas tp byk space yg tidak terawat sayang sekali. Kolam renangnya kotor. Sarapan biasa aja. Harga sangat murah untuk kamar yg besar

judul_review: “Great resort type hotel inside a city”
deskripsi: We enjoyed our short staycation here. Location is fantastic which is near from the largest shopping centres in Surabaya. As well, there are quite many fast food places & cafes within walking distance. Breakfast varieties have seemed like lesser than 7 years ago when we 1st time stayed. Food taste is pretty good. Additional pax for breakfast is at IDR 197K for adult.
Got the best room with city view on both room and bathroom, never been more satisfied and sad to leave after just one day of stay

Bumi Surabaya City Resort is an elegant city resort located in the heart of Surabaya, Indonesia. The hotel features 242 contemporary rooms and suites, each styled with subtle references to Java's rich artistic heritage. Guests can enjoy a charming garden with mature trees and waterways, providing a tranquil retreat amidst the bustling city

I come to Surabaya twice a year from UK...i always book with this hotel
..its the best value for money around and the staff are so prifesdional and friebdly..soecial mention for Nyman who looks after the guests in the breakfast area...one of the happiest guys i know

Hotel bekas Hyatt hotel dahulu. Secara keseluruhan baik. Hanya problem AC yg tidak dingin sudah bertahun2 tanpa perbaikan.
Chiller sdh harus diganti dengan kapasitas yg lebih besar agar AC  berjalan normal- dingin.
This is a grand old hotel. The facilities are good, but the room is quite dated. Amazing breakfast spread.
Nginep disini selama 5 hari sangat memuaskan, deket dari mana-mana. Breakfast nya enak. Recommended lah buat yang suka jalan-jalan apalagi bawa bocil.
resort在市中心，最近的shopping mall距离不到一公里，非常方便。整体的庭院造景很漂亮，是一个可以休憩身心的好地方。
去泗水是为了爬火山，来到这resort，真的可以好好休息，享受一番。舒适的房间，丰富的早餐，漂亮的庭园造景，使得我们的火山之旅画下完美句点。还有它里购物商场很近，整体来说是很棒的住宿。

The lobby and garden was astounding. Though the hotel touts itself as a 5-star establishment, the staff, though helpful, were not adequately refined in their service. The breakfast had a great variety of Indonesian cuisine but was super jam-packed. And the teeny weeny TV could use an upgrade.
Bagus overall
Very nice ambience with traditional & Hindu artifacts cooling & mind calmness to go this resort located near to heart of city
Bagus

This is a nice stay in Surabaya. Very comfortable beds, great shower, great breakfast. Near the train station, shopping, food, etc. and some of the important historical parts of the city. This was our second stay, and we'd stay again.

Old and 90s hotel. In European standard it is a 3,5*. Big bedroom. Uncomfortable bed (bad mattress). Bad AC. 1 pool closed. Nice breakfast but not spectacular. I asked the reception to print 1A4 (my boarding pass) and they asked me for money (this never happened to me in decades in hotels of many categories - really unpolite).

I'm not usually a 5 star resort kind of person, so if that's what we're comparing it to I may be biased.  I really enjoyed my time here.  The breakfast was awesome and I found the staff to be super helpful.  Room view was amazing and the pool was nice.

judul_review: “Going down hill but still quite nice”
deskripsi:
A once grand hotel going down hill slowly - for me the benefits still outweigh the flaws. Grand design. very nice rooms, good pool, good. huge breakfast, and close to shops etc. What could be criticised? well, it's fading, eg some of the carpets are looking grubby. And everything is slow - the lifts are slow, the staff are slow, the hot water is slow. Eg I rang up to get my laundry picked up - no one ever came. So dropped it at reception where they said it would be in my room that evening. It never came. I rang for it the next morning - after a long wait it did arrive, but a sum too big for my cash so I asked to pay by card. This meant another long wait while the card machine arrived. In the meantime. I asked the laundry. man to restart my AC, he ran around the room in a panic looking for the remote, while I tried to explain the control was on the wall.So, it has a lot of staff who are very good at standing around and nodding and opening doors, but pretty weak at anything else. Eg I was checked into thee wrong sort of room, but I just went along with it and unpacked. Then they rang me and said they'd move me as they'd made a mistake, so I had to repack. Wouldnt it have just been easier not to make the mistake in the first place?
But don't get me wrong - the flaws are annoying, but until it deteriorates further,  this my hotel of choice.

Me and my boyfriend recently stayed at Bumi Surabaya City Resort and was thoroughly impressed by the entire experience. The resort's lush, tropical gardens create a serene oasis in the heart of the bustling city, offering a perfect blend of tranquility and luxury. The rooms are spacious, elegantly decorated, and equipped with all the modern amenities one could need. The staff are incredibly attentive and courteous, always ready to assist with a warm smile. The dining options are diverse and delicious, catering to a variety of tastes. The pool area is also good, providing a refreshing escape from the heat. Overall, Bumi Surabaya City Resort exceeded my expectations and provided a memorable stay that I would highly recommend to anyone visiting Surabaya.

We did not set any expectations and yet our experiene at the hotel is nothing short of amazing. From the first greeting at the lobby to our check out, the staffs are always ready to assist you. Buffet breakfast serves delicious local cuisine and we are comparing to all the street food and other restaurants in the city. I particularly love the garden, such a luxurious view in the middle of the city. The room is also spacious and well equipped although the air conditioner was a bit on the warmer side (not too bad cause we didn't call them to rectify). Overall, a really good stay!

I had to go to an exchange office and exchange additional dollars for rupees, which was quite hectic.

Nice decent hotel with great staff and their hospitality is amazing. Location is in the city centre and easily reach to any attractions and stores. Breakfast buffet is nice, the taste is flavorful but should be more varieties of menu and changes daily. Overall, sarisfied. Highly recommended.

The room is extremely outdated, cleanliness is lacking and subpar, lobby at night is full of mosquito..perhaps need to check the fogging schedule. when I arrived they assigned me in disable room, safety box was not available however they immediately addres it. Breakfast service is subpar however food is delicious and everyone is extremely friendly. just need to improve the attention of details such as Missing napkin, faster table reset, offering drinks, refilling empty food  on the buffet, cleaning the food area etc. All the staff work hard and dserve 5 stars .thank you everyone..

First checked in they put us in a room with broken air conditioned that wouldn't cool. We requested a change of room but they sent their technician and expected us to waste our vacation stay to wait while they fix the problem that is not ours. We insisted we'd rather move and left to grab dinner and asked they help sorted our luggage and moved them to the new appointed room. We came back at 21.30 got our new keys at the reception asked if they have have moved our luggage. They hadn't and said they would do it right then. So we went up and waited. We waited and waited. Half an hour we rang reception to follow up on the luggage they said they were looking into it. My youngest 3 year old was tired and sleep and ready to fall asleep but her formula was in the bag together with the luggage. Imagine waiting for over an hour disrupting the young ones'sleep and milk schedule.
So the luggage eventually came and we got ready to sleep. The air con in the new room couldn't me adjusted. So if we turned it on it gets too cold and if we turned it off it gets too hot. At one am we had to turn it off because it was too cold and it woke us up from our sleep. Eventually we could sleep. At 5am my young one was awakened because it was too hot. We turn the ac back on. she couldnt fall back asleep until 6.  Because of our disrupted sleep we couldnt wake up in time to catch breakfast because it closes at 10am.
To make it worst the ac was pointing straight at the bed. Because the air blowing straight into our face I caught a cold that day. I was feeling sick the whole day I had to take panadol and vitamin. The second night my fever got worse because yes the air con was too cold and if we turn it off it got to hot. I slept that night with double clothes and shivering and chattering  teeth the whole night.
Oh because I was sick I couldn't make it to the second day breakfast either.
Total it was a waste of my money staying in this hotel.

judul_review: “Huge improvement in cleanliness is urgently required”
deskripsi:
The hotel itself is nice, the lobby as well. The room(s) are the main problem. The rooms are dirty, there are multiple black spots on the carpet. The bathup is not usable. The floor of the bathup is clearly dirty, however, the staffs said that nothing can be done, since the dirt are already ingrained there since a long time ago. The toilets are constantly leaking water (so much for the topic of water conservation). We communicated these issues with the staffs, while they are helpful, nothing can be done to fix the problem. Moreover, the rooms are really lacking in lights, especially at night. There are in total 4 lamps, 2 standing lamps and 2 table lamps. Those are definitely not enough to lighten the room.

Would not recommend to stay there.

judul_review: “Great staff and value for the price!”
deskripsi: I spent 2 days at Bumi and have no regrets. The location worked for well for me and the service was excellent. My only feedback for the resort is to focus on cleanliness details of the room. For such a nice resort, there are some details that could be touched up in the rooms. Overall great value and I would stay here again. Thanks Bumi!

This is a once grand hotel, well designed, great building and gardens, and 3 pools!! But it's running down through lack of maintenance - which its owners must know, but choose to not do anything yet. So: worn and stained carpets, lampshades and toilet off centre, slow air conditioning, hot water variable, enthusiastic but inexperienced young staff -but the layout, pools and gardens are still grand. Great location, big brekky area... when prices are lower this a great value hotel of shabby splendour. But you may need to be patient.

This hotel has been around for decades! From memory, it was the first 5-star hotel in Surabaya (Hyatt Bumi). Every time we stay here, we always end up in very old room. It's clean and everything, but very old. This current one didn't even have the in-room safe anymore. Apparently there are newer, renovated rooms, but we've never seen them, maybe because we always pay heavily discounted price from one of those cheap hotel sites. The breakfast at Arumanis is always really good, although after COVID, the range and quality went down significantly. Service is still top notch though. Every time we ring to ask for something, their response time is always very quick. Every one of the staff is always very courteous. The gym equipment is probably as old as the hotel, but still functional - there was regular member of the gym when I was there making a comment that whoever bought the equipment had passed on long ago. LOL!

She also go beyond extra mile by giving us two bottles of Jamu drinks during our breakfast before our departure. Kudos BUMI for having us. Looking forward for another stay with YOU soonest.

judul_review: “Hotel Bumi Surabaya is #1 in my list!”
deskripsi:
I have always stayed at hotel bumi surabaya when i visited Surabaya, coz in here I feel like in our own house!

However this property is quite old so it may need to be refurnished and upgraded.

judul_review: “Big room, not too expensive, cozy environment”
deskripsi: Room was big compare to other hotel, price was reasonable, good breakfast, staff very friendly ......  good place to stay in Surabaya

After 2 years of pandemic this is our first trip back to Surabaya and finally have a chance to be back at Bumi. I personally have a feeling that the property will have some miss during our stay this time due to pandemic. And well thats happen! 

However my parents do have a sentimental feeling towards this hotel, so there we go stay there for 4 nights. 

Just avoid a room in the corner side. Yeah its bigger but we found the ac is not working really well, the carpet kinda dusty, and there are molds in the shower area.  The furnitures in the bathroom are either: broken, having a water stain on the glass, or the table legs are rusty. 

After 2 days staying at the corner room on the 11th floor. I finally ask the staff to change our room. And we got a nice room at 18th floor. Boy.. what a difference. That 18th floor room are the one that I expect to stay at Bumi. The bathroom is spotless, the room is clean in general. 

For The breakfast is still awesome! Yeah there are some decreasing in food menu but still they are a better hotel for serving bfast menu IMO. 

Anw, this is not meant to be a bad review for the hotel we dearly love. In fact I love staying at this hotel that much so that I even make time to write this review. The staff at Bumi are the best of the best IMO.  

I would hope my review can become a heads up for the management. The pandemic is almost over and i hope they can start checking their room facilities and start fixing stuff that need to be fixed. So then when the travelers are back traveling they are ready to welcome them with a 5 stars hotel standard.
If you prefer a big room, not too expensive,  good breakfast, this is the best choice
Cheapest 5star hotel in Surabaya, buat too old and the breakfast menu not many options

level. Not only many restaurants are closed the one open only serves a limited buffet course. We hope the hotel recovers after covid

Room
- Room was spacious and had an extra-large bed which was very comfortable. AC seemed to be malfunctioning in the day but worked well at night. Bathtub had black dust come out of it and was not cleaned properly.

Breakfast
Breakfast was amazing and worth staying there. Foodies will love the great spread and the various live stations. The dishes were also tasty and artfully displayed and served.

Location

It was my first family staycation at Hotel Bumi Surabaya. The facilities and amenities were great. I love the breakfast (couldn't agree more, right? a lot of varieties of food provided with a good taste for sure), the garden (good spot for photography), the swimming pool and many other facilities. Toiletries also complete. 
But there is some room for improvements:
1.  Staff's accuracy in work. When I checked in the room and looked for the water bottle, I found that one of the two complementary water bottles was not full. I asked my wife (not my sons, because my sons are still 2 yo, not tall enough to reach the water bottle, and 3 months old) and she said did not drink from the bottle. It means that the staff did not check carefully when making up the room. 

2. The bedsheets and bed cover were quite dirty like it hasn't changed from the previous customer. I found some yellow stain in bedsheets and tomato-stain-like in back of bedcover.  If everything was clean, it would be great.

5 star hotel facilities need to be more luxury
I will stay again

Very nice hotel, the room was big and clean, the breakfast all good, the kids love the pool and the staff very friendly and welcome. Joe at reception that helped us during our check-in was very nice, warm and helpful. We stayed for 2 nights and it feels like home there. Would definitely come back again.
For such a wonderful hotel from the welcome to food and cleaniless, the sore point was the state of the toilet bowl.

judul_review: “Probably the best hotel I have ever stayed in.”
deskripsi:
Spacious room.
A garden oasis in a busy city area 
Creative breakfast area with local style choices if you want that 
Numerous staff, clearly well-trained to deliver hospitality in a professional manner.

i believe this hotel has the best breakfast. it also provided variety of foods. the staff were friendly and the room is spacious. the location just 10 mins walk to Tunjungan Plaza. i will recommend this hotel to everyone.

Best hotel in Surabaya.

The room is VERY SPACIOUS. Far more spacious than most 5-star hotels. Air conditioning is very good, the windows are clean. Beds are very comfortable and the rooms are very comfortable. Bathroom and showers are excellent, and also very spacious. Water pressure is good, and water temperature is very good.

Excellent breakfast, the best nasi goreng ever. Very complete breakfast, all delicious and all very fulfilling. The quality of breakfast is very excellent, better than most 5-star hotels. 

Very nice swimming pool and very nice gym facilities.

Excellent staff that are all very friendly, better than most 5-star hotels in big towns such as Jakarta and Surabaya.  I would like to compliment Mas Joe and Mas Nyoman as managers, and also Mba Nenny in reception, for their excellent service during my multiple visits to the hotel.

Location is close to the city, which is very good.

Carpets need to be replaced and cleaned more regularly. Staff should be a little more proactive in making decisions about guests request and not wait for superiors decisions.  Great breakfasts. Prices at restaurant on 3rd floor were outrageous ($20 CAD for 2 bowls of soup).   The hotel staff are the best anywhere compared.  Saying sorry Sir does not solve the problem. My second visit there and could be more since I travel to Surabaya quite often. Great rooms .
It is a very well runned hotel. Very clean and very friendly staff.
value for 5 * star hotel, breakfast has many varieties. was a good stay
nice hotel and value for money

Excellent, high quality hotel in Surabaya. Great location not far from the train station. Great food, pleasant and relaxing garden setting. Staff very helpful and rooms are high quality and well maintained.

We had a great stay! Loved the room as it was really spacious. The only thing that might need some work would be the toilet. Other than that, the breakfast was great. Loved the staff who were always so willing to help. Thanks for making our stay a memorable one.

Everything’s beyond my expectation. Bedroom and bathroom are spacious and comfortable. The hotel location exactly in front of the main road and easy access to everywhere.  As for the breakfast menu’s, super excellent, so many  varieties of foods to eat and it’s so delicious. For the hotel staff, they are super friendly. I will stay at this hotel again in the near future. Love it.
Excellent

The hotel is very good and the service of the staff too.
The location is convenient too.

judul_review: “Facility, breakfast and also price is nice”
deskripsi: We enjoy stay in Bumi Hotel

The hotel exceeds our expectation esp with the amount of money we paid for it. Love the bfast buffet spread and they are yummylicous. Pool is also accessible at night which is a bonus to us as during the day we would be out.
Staff is also very friendly and always smiling.

judul_review: “For me, its like hotel in a garden. With the smell of lemon grass when entering the lobby. Superb!”
deskripsi:
Two major point that need to be rectify:
1) check in time as stated in the hotel policy is at 2.00pm. Up until 3.30pm we did not get our room yet. Booking was for 5 rooms.
2) cleanliness of room toilet. Overall it is clean. But there’s smell or urine eventho it looks clean. I have to clean it by myself the toilet.
Stay in this hotel makes you feel apart from the city. A perfect place for resting

judul_review: “Serene refuge despite the hustle and bustle of the heart of Surabaya”
deskripsi:
This may be a very old hotel (original building was built in late 1970's), but it's still reasonably well maintained.We stayed at the slightly newer building (probably built in late 1980's).  I'll start with the bad, around cleanliness and facilities (why I gave only 3*). The carpet in our rooms (we had 2 connecting rooms) were badly stained, luckily there's no smell at all. The air cond vent was also very visibly dusty. Also, although the rooms had no musty or any bad smell at all, the hallway was a little smelly. Around the facilities, the gym can benefit from revitalisation, and the in-room basic infrastructure and amenities such as wiring and hair dryer also desperately need upgrades. 

The rooms were tastefully decorated
The room is clean and the hotel staff are very friendly and helpful, like Joe who handled our check-in.

This is my 3rd time stay at here
I really love to stay here i feel cozy n peaceful
I will cone back again next year!
Good Job
Room is not morden type but Breakfast is so wonderful!

judul_review: “The place is good , and so classy , the room is absolutly out standing , the city view is good”
deskripsi: Its good

Make sure you choose with breakfast included - you wont be disappointed, most amazing breakfast I think I've ever had, but mainly Indonesian/Asian food.  So many cooking stations, everything made for you on the spot - fresh and tasty.  Same at night, if you go for the all you can eat at 195,000IR AU$19.50 per head - off the scale variety of yummy food options.  All set in the beautiful garden.  Stay there if just for the Food Experience.  Trust me!!!

judul_review: “breakfast is amazing! best of the best”
deskripsi:
As for the room: we stayed two nights with the standard room. Everything is a bit of dated especially the toilet facility and it didn't flush well because of the pressure I guess. The room is spacious and has everything you need for a comfortable stay that is a nice touch.
Regarding the swimming pool: it looks good to have fun. There are towels alongside the pool where you can help yourself and staff there are very caring.
Breakfast: a wide variety of choices and it is like a food market where you can taste all! we have traveled through Java to Bali, found nothing that was in parallel. So I would say the hotel offers exceptionally good food. In additon, the dinner buffet is worth trying as well. BBQ looks so good and have fun!
Good

This is my 1st time staying in Bumi Surabaya and I was super impressed, the hotel was really clean, staffs are friendly and given me a feel of visiting Bali. Definitely will be my preferred choice on my next visit to Surabaya.
over all good

love this hotel so much..the room really huge with bathtub,the breakfast really good and the garden are nice..my daughter love the gelato so much.
the price really reasonable for that kind of room.
Good Job
Great hotel. large rooms, great swimming pool. and off course the breakfast is very amazing. try bumi surabaya if you want another experience

Great location & service staff.
Need more improvement on wifi connection.  Good connection, but it will auto log out after just a few minutes and you have to re-log in again. Hassle.
Breakfast situation was very hectic. None of the staff wouldn’t help you to find a table. You chopped your own table. 
Super massive long queue for us just to get a very decent portion of fried rice and fried noodles, since they’ll cook them in front of you.
They should have a bar or chill out place.
Nonetheless, great ambience.
Outstanding and friendly staff!!

I got upgraded to a corner room.  I was Hyatt hence the high quality and luxury through out the property. Large Space in a major city for a resort is hard to come by these days. Only minor details of decay in the bathroom was a let down and also they didnt wipe down the shades in the bathroom window either it was so dusty. Despite that I enjoyd my Stay So much and it was totally worth the price.

Very comfortable, well run hotel.  Our room was spacious and had a great view.  Lots of food options if you didn't want to eat out.  Hotel is close enough to walk to a big shopping plaza and Majapahit Hotel.

Best family staycation.. fresh air di tengah kota sby.. staff yg humble dan murah senyum ..
Request untuk 1 kmr didecor untuk surprise bday my mom and the result is very satisfaying.. my mom was very touched, happy and very memorable.. thankyou bumi sity resort surabaya 💕

I was very amazing about how the hotel look like..
it is in the middle of town.. but after we came in to the lobby.. it feel like at the Village..
the food is fantastic
only one problem.. the AC is not cold enough....

judul_review: “Nice Hotel In The Middle of Surabaya ”
deskripsi: The atmosphere and environment of the hotel is very comfortable. The room is spacious and clean. The breakfast is very delicious with many kinds of food. The pool also very clean and comfort. The staffs are very friendly and helpful. We will return to this hotel again if we visit Surabaya.
Nice, helpful and courteous staff.

judul_review: “Great food, great location, great value for money ”
deskripsi: Javanese food was so delicious
I’ve returned to this hotel for my second visit. Like the ambiance for breakfast session, lots of choice and nice food.
The hotel rooms are quite spacious, the food is delicious, and the staff are friendly.
Good Job
Good value for money, except there are smokers in breakfast area and lot of flies hanging on your plate.

I wish I could rate this more than 10 stars. Its amazing beyond words. The whole ambience and aura of the hotel was mind blowing. As you enter the hotel, you are welcomed with the fragrance of tulip flowers lingering around the hotel. Next the Front Office staffs were astounding, very very welcoming and accommodating. They gave us complimentary late check out. We ordered a wine opener and they came to our room to open the wine. The bed was comfortable and also the room was super clean. The breakfast buffet next day is one of the best I have ever had, complete with all kind of indonesian and western dishes. Will definitely come back again. Good job to the hotel for providing us with one of a kind service.
Good job

telephone in operation, either line cut or hand set damage, so could not make any call, even to front desk
aircon set to coldest but not cold, need refurbishment
no hairdryer 
hot water not enough, so only cold water during evening shower, but early in the morning hot water available
Friendly
I always stay at Hotel Bumi. It is very much old style Grandeur.  The carpets need to be updated however.

This hotel is supposed to be gd after reading other reviews. I arrived fr Malang where i stayed at Tugu where e food n service is top notched. But the treatment i get from Bumi is far apart from Tugu. Maybe coz Bumi is a v big hotel so its not tt personalised. The room 1862 aircon is bad n they changed me to another room after tt. The breakfast has a wide variety but if u r not local u cant appreciate most of e food. The buffet dinner looks grand but then again no seafood bbq or other quality food items to look for. So i think Bumi can improve further by updating the menu n providing value added services like daily fruit platter n complimentary mini bar in the room.
The resort located in the middle city and busy. But inside the hotel is very calming like youre in another world. With the coconut tree and many garden. very reconmended to relax.
Lovely ... especially pool, breakfast spread, green area near front ..great place especially with promo deals.
Although the hotel is old but still a luxury hotel with big room and others facility in centre Surabaya.

The hotel is not new, but I think it's really well maintained. The room is big and clean; no bad smell from the carpet in the room. The garden is not really big, but good enough considering it's in the middle of the city centre. The breakfast is awesome; lots of choices and the tastes are good too.

The only problem was when I checked in, the front office staff gave me a room that was still occupied by another guest. I didn't understand why this could be happened. I had to go back to the front office and the staff gave me a new room. I was unhappy with the arrangement  as I was so tired after having a 2 hours delay flight from Jakarta and she made me go back to the ground floor to get the correct room.

Besides that issue, everything was just great.

Staying 1 night in their classic room.. The hotel was old but very nice.. the room was spacious. I tried “all you can eat” buffet for dinner which also very good, with 198k IDR we eat all the menus in 3 restaurants. Almost all foods were delicious.
Breakfast also very good...
Unfortunately they still put broken linen for their guest, which is not acceptable for 5 stars hotel.
Please put more lights in the parking building.

judul_review: “Nice hotel. Big Room with resort setting.”
deskripsi: Nice hotel. Big Room with resort setting. We love it. Will come back again soon!!
Ok

First class all around great place to stay. Staff, food, gym where all top notch. Especially the staff. Super friendly and always asking if your needs have been met. I travel a lot and this was one of the best. Dale

Hotel is good generally.
Cons - one part of the room can’t be darkened due to the layout near the cupboard that uses blind.
Cons- carpet in corridor smells badly. Need invest in a good machine that can dries the carpet well.
Will stay at same hotel again!
Good Job, good Hotel.
Keep & maintain the good things better. : )
Foods were delicious. Nice hotel. Friendly staff. Good location.
Hotel in the center of Surabaya city

It was amazing stay. It was really worth it. But on last day i stayed, i decided to play table tennis. But unfortunately the guy in the reception told us to put a shoes in order to play. I was like huh? The day before, we played table tennis and used SANDAL... and it was okay. No one told me to use sport shoes. But why the next day i couldnt use sandal to play???? Really disappointed. 

Btw we step on a carpet. Not some slippery floor. Why should we use shoes?
The pool.is big, and open 24hs. Resort is beautiful and well kept. Breakfast was great - local, japanese, western.  Walking distance to shopping mall and conv store.
This hotel is the greatest hotel in Indonesia~~I loved to stay in this hotel and I felt sad when I have to leave. If I have chance to visit Surabaya then I will definetly staying in this hotel.
nice and beautiful.
Awesome breakfast spread, love the vibe, great facilities & super friendly staff. 20 mins grab ride to TP mall

Room is spacious, bed also comfort & big enough for 2 adults & 2 young kids, bathroom also very spacious with separated closet, shower room, and bathtub. 

breakfast also awesome with various menu of Indonesian food & traditional snacks

Note: for carpet in the room need to be cleaned by vacuum cleaner so that it won't be too dusty
Still best hotel in town . Excellent in all aspect .

very happy to be back to this hotel, the management of this hotel can keep the building (room) still as before when they were managed by Hyatt. very nice Staff, room are big, excellent breakfast. highly recomendded for people who traveling to Surabaya.
For room so comfort even its look old style, but clean.. the food is good and also the area restaurant in the yard, its so nature. For the facilities is complete and oke..
Top notch place to stay with excellent service.

The foamier Hyatt - lovely grounds, very nice pool and good rooms.
One of the best breakfast buffets I have ever seen.
Wee located in city centre - near universities, plazas and Gramedia bookshop.
Lots of small eateries nearby too.
Only complaint that internet - as in so many Indonesian hotels...can be very slow.
Need more friendly staff...
Cozy atmosphere ,good hospitality and nice food.definately come back soon
Breakfast is exceptional., room is very nice, my favorite hotel to stay in Surabaya.
Big party with loud music til 22 hours, very old hotel , first and last time , you get what you pay this is 3 star maximum

judul_review: “Best affordable 5 star hotel with best quality ever ”
deskripsi: The staffs are really friendly , the room is really clean and spacious for the superior room. Even the facilities is very nice as well. Def worth your time staying here and it’s Super close to tanjungan mall which has basically everything there

When visiting Surabaya this hotel must be considered!  I had a very comfortable and relaxing stay at Bumi Surabaya.  The facility was awesome.  The staff was helpful and friendly. Breakfast was amazing with so many variety to choose from. Room was clean and a good size.
Highly recommended especially when travelling with family.
Nice breakfast in garden that i never forget, strong recommended

We stay 2 Nites in this hotel after hiking to Bromo and Ijen.

The room was spaces, and we love the breakfast so much.
Environment very good and a lot of variety.  We enjoy the breakfast in the garden.

Staff are very helpful.
you cannot get any better than this with that price

Hotel was superb with their staff friendliness.Facilities was great.
Breakfast spread was awesome lotsa variety choose from.Room spacious bed comfortable.Recommended to stay.
Very  enjoy able stay,good breakfast and nice room.
Almost perfect if the bathroom facilities are better

Strategic location in the city. The atmosphere is very calm and serene. The staffs are very friendly and helpful. The room and bathroom are spacious and very clean. Variety choices of delicious foods are served for breakfast. Will definitely stay here again when I'm in Surabaya.

It is value for money with 5 star hotel in surabaya. Spacious cozy room, huge bath room but old. We found some trash left behind the dustbin in bath room. Abit gross.  Should put the mineral water on room table instead of bathroom. Fantastic breakfast tho.
This hotel with 5 stars so recommended, with great hospitality, great room, great food to representation Indonesian. Pool is very satisfied.
Great location and staff are very friendly

Location is great, value for money, bit old but no problem. Little complain on the gym staff (Livia) its quite rude and they have policy for not allowing children to enter the gym area without facility for children to play or tv while waiting for their parents doing exercise. They allow us to exercise but also in the same time need to monitor the kids for not entering “an open with no barrier” of the gym facility. I end up stopping my treadmill after 10 minutes (usually around 1 hours per day) because the gym staff already remind me 3 times because my kid step on the gym area in front of me. Weird policy - its not family friendly hotel - what a waste.

For me, this is the best hotel in Surabaya. The hotel so big & has the perfect location in the centre of this city. Will get the different atmosphere here, with original javanese design. The room was spacious & clean. The hospitality from the staff were excellent. They gave me a little surprise come to my room & give me a birthday cake & they were song for me. Because that day is my birthday. Absolutelly will come again to enjoy my pleasure weekend in my own downtown

The hotel has a great buffet breakfast line, so much to choice. Service may be improve though except for one of the service staff, named Fitria.  We were having breakfast and it took more than 45 mins before the table was cleared and it was Fitria who cleared our tables.  

The rest of the staff were just hanging around the cashier’s counter.
I have enjoyed most throughout my stay.
High floor, quiet, super clean, friendly staff.
Good Place & Memorable lah tempat ini
The hotel and surrounding areas are excellent.  However, too many mosquitos.

judul_review: “It was a nice place to be stay during my visit to Surabaya”
deskripsi: Please add some hose pipe in your toilet.
having a feeling of home, cozy and comfortable
Nice and clean, very good breakfast. Food and drinks very expensive and loads of mosquitos inside and outside restaurants. Would stay again if price is right
Huge swimming pool, nice gym for a hotel with s sauna hot spa and cold plunge pool really nice place to unwind and relax great food huge breakfast choices
Good Hotel, Good Services, *****

Everything is good
Only things room surrounding proof no enough 
Inside Room and outdoor so much mosquitos
Everything has been great. Starting from the staffs, the rooms, and the facilities. All still up to the hyatt hotels standard

We only stay for 1 night at this hotel. Impressive with Majapahit Garden at night. In room dining very nice and breakfast food parade was good. Room are specious with comfy bed and amazing bath room. Highly recommended hotel, value for money and i will stay again at this hotel in future.

Arrived at the hotel at 3pm to allow ample time for a 1pm check in only to find that out room wasn't ready and we had to wait an extra 20 minutes. The staff did not offer us any compensation for our troubles, even welcome drinks would have been nice.  I expect better service from a 5 star hotel.

It was really good break with my husband 
Love the ambience smeel lemongrass long the hall way 
Keep it up the good job

Our family experience to stay here was great! Not so pricey but we get great breakfast , spacey room as it was Hyatt standard , big pool, Nice Gym & locker room,  Walking distance to big mall in Surabaya & check in 1pm earlier than other hotels. Will stay in this Hotel When we’ll be in Surabaya again.

It was a great stay at Bumi Surabaya. The staff were great and always extremely polite and very accommodating..  The breakfast was incredible. More than what I could have asked for. Rooms were kept very clean. The carpets need replacing though. On old hotel but terrific ambiance and an almost antique feel.
I am coming back there.
Yoga Naidu - President
Horizons Unlimited Group :
B.C. Canada :
Pros: dinner v good. Staff friendly. Breakfast amazing! Pool great too.

judul_review: “Exceptional but there is still room for improvement”
deskripsi: Would be perfect if the bathtub was not stained.
'nothing was a problem and staff where so polite and efficient, the room was perfect
Excellent breakfast. High quality, nice to sit in the morning outside.

This is the best 5stars hotel that I have even been. I have been to UAE,Philippine, China, Myanmar, Taiwan. So far this hotel is the best I have been stayed. 
In addition, also thumb up to the breakfast and facilities. My families like like it very much and would definitely will be back in the future.
Lastly the overall business concepts and models are well designed and structured.

judul_review: “Amazing 5 star hotel, Top service and Delicious breakfast”
deskripsi:
Had an amazing experience staying at Bumi Surabaya City Resort. Although the hotel is located in the city, you would not feel the hustle-bustle of the city.  It is like being in Bali, with the decorations and furnitures. 

Value for money! the breakfast spread is one of the best I have ever been to. Definitely worth every penny.
Breakfast was superb

judul_review: “The breakfast was great. The staff very polite..”
deskripsi: This is an old hotel and the carpets may have to be replaced.. The gardens are incredible. The settings for the breakfast are an oasis in the middle of the masses an overabundance of commercialism.. Staff are incredibly polite.. Western world needs to come out here to learn about treat a fellow human being. This is my 5th visit here in about 2 1/2 years.  Did similar visits to the Philippines and what a difference in cleanliness and attitudes.
All look good to me

So we stayed here for a night after our Mount Bromo and Ijen activities. 
Entrance - we were welcome by their staff with warm smile :)

Reception - the staff very prompt helping us upon our check-in. Cons though - they didn’t tell us which floor our room would be and what time and where the breakfast location would be.

Hotel Room - pretty big with great city view. We have all we needed even weighing scale. Sort of my requirement in a hotel room during my staff.

Location - it’s pretty close/nearby to a lot of restaurants that just walking distance if you’re like us love to walk. And 15mins walk by Tunjungan Plaza very big mall :)

Hotel Restaurants - they’re about 3/4 available within the hotel and very good variety of food to choose with. Great food as well.

Staff - very friendly and always ready to assist you.

Overall very happy and satisfied with our 1 night stay. Will stay here again once we’re back in Surabaya.

judul_review: “Spacious Hotel, nice view and beautiful garden”
deskripsi: The Hotel is great and really big with a wonderful garden. Perfect for our little son to run around far away from traffic or other dangers. Didn't manage to try out all facilities (e.g. pool), but the restaurant concept is great.
Excellent hotel with Indonesian hospitality.
great stay in a rather "jaded" hotel

lots of different variety of breakfast made me skip lunch.
room is good and the rest is also good
perfect for location, friendly staff and value for money..of course the breakfast its very nice
perfect for location, friendly staff and good for money

judul_review: “Great Hotel in the center of surabaya”
deskripsi: perfect for location, friendly staff and good for money

judul_review: “Urban oasis in the heart of Surabaya ”
deskripsi:
Very affordable business class hotel with friendly attentive staff, spacious rooms, and excellent facilities including full spa, 2 swimming pools, and expansive gardens. Huge breakfast buffet included in rate.  Several restaurant options, all warm service and excellent food. 
Some services are very expensive. For example, I was charged rp 99,000 for a cup of coffee ( 3x Starbucks) and laundry cost more than the daily room rate.
I love this hotel, the place is perfect. The pool was superb, big and my children love it. Overall we've had enjoyable two-night stay there. Definitely recommended.

judul_review: “We loved our stay and will return”
deskripsi: Top notch breakfast, nice resort ambiance in the middle of Surabaya city center, spacious room,  well-priced room rate. We will return.

judul_review: “Still my favorite hotel but a little bit disappointed”
deskripsi: This hotel is my family’s favorite place for staycation. Everything went well like usual until i checked complimentary mineral bottled water in bath room. One of them was not sealed and half empty. Maybe the housekeeping didn’t check the mineral water while they prepare the room. I hope they’ll improve the service because we really love this place and we surely will come again to this hotel.

We booked 13 rooms over 2-5 nights in July. As a group we enjoyed our stay, the atmosphere, cleanliness and the STAFF were amazing. Thank you again for hosting our wedding and the experience here has been fantastic. Felix and Devi
all aspects are excellent. its pleasant to stay in this hotel for every visiting Surabaya.
Nice hotel
Nice hotel
Nice hotel, spacious, variety choices for breakfast.

Nice breakfast and friendly staff.
but room with mosquitoes.

bagus
pemandangan sekitarnya bagus, kamarnya bagus [sedikit info, kamar 209 lt.2 bau air got, aromanya itu dari kamar mandi] mohon dikroscek saluran air nya]
fasilitasnya bagus.. kami msh betah sayangnya pas kami reserv cm dpt jatah 1 mlm
anyway just be gratefull n say thank you for
God bless...
The room was so big, and it has a bath up with separate shower,, the breakfast was good,, the location is great,,

judul_review: “Worth and will Recommend Friend if stay in surabaya ”
deskripsi: Best Hotel in Surabaya , Very good Breakfast and alot of Choices

the breakfast was really good many choices of food from traditional counter. 
the  room was comfort and clean 
maybe the bed should be concern regarding the age of bed

judul_review: “Great Value For Money, Excellent Room and Breakfast”
deskripsi:
Bumi Surabaya is my favorit when visiting Surabaya. I found the room is excellent, spacious with good ambience. Breakfast is considered the best among the hotel I've stayed. The hotel also provide large swimming pool, jacuzzi, small pool for kids as well as gym.
I recognized it is great in terms of great value for money and would recommend this hotel as the first choice to stay in Surabaya

Great resort to spend holiday in Surabaya. Located in the city center, near to Tunjungan Plaza.
Beautiful garden inside the hotel, very relaxing.
Breakfast is superb with many choices and traditional food.
Huge pool and gym
Lumayan sesuai dgn harga ... it was hyatt
Petugas kurang ramah ... overall oke lah

I am stay 6 days in this hotel and really comfortable. The hotel is clean and have good service.
This hotel is recommended for long stay.

Near Tunjungan Malls.
Food in Hotel delighted us with wide choices, including local cuisines. 
Rooms are clean and cosy. 
Pools  has locker room.
Staff were polite and helpful.

Never dissapointed by this hotel everytime we stayed here. Consider this hotel is not too far from our hometown, this will be our home not too far from home. Will be back again very soon for another staycation. This is best value hotel in Surabaya.
good

judul_review: “Friendly Staff, Nice Buffet Dinner with many choices of food”
deskripsi: The Location is strategic near Tunjungan Plaza, hotel is clean, fast WiFi, friendly staff. The best is Dinner with sooo many options of food with great taste.

Older hotel but very comfortable..... luxurious and comfortable and very spacious..... the staff are very accommodating and friendly . the hotel is well appointed.

my only issue is the poor availability of plug points within the room.

Well maintained
Good choice
pelayanan dipertahankan
Nil
food menu shouldn’t repeated every day

your staff at breakfast time espesially at the “stand nasi goreng” impolite during serves to the guests , it was not kindly hearted when my wife and others  guest asking to him

please highligt this matter when other things are good even better

Its a nice hotel from outside with fragrant high volume lobby. But lacks in room maintenance for a five star category hotel. Front lobby staff service requires improvement. Overall it’s a nice property in a great location

The Bumi Surabaya hotel is an excellent hotel to stay. The facilities are great. The reason why it is only mentioned "Good" in stead of "Excellent" is because it is - for international travellers - unacceptable that the alcohol policy of the city of Surabaya prohibits to sell drnks like a simple wine, etc.  The hotel must strongly protest against this rule.  Although the bathroom facilities can be improved (read: modernised) it is a pleasure to stay here. For the parking facilities it seems to me it would save time if the reception gives you a stamp on the parking ticket, in stead of having the security phoning the reception again. It takes unnecessary extra time.  Further it is wearth to come back again.

1)i need 1king bed,early booking at 6am.and check in 6pm  ask king bed already full.only given twin bed.. what a suck hotel 5 star like this..

2)Cold water is leaking around 5am until i check out 10pm never be fix asap.. bathing with hot water..

3)swimming pool cant wear tshirt round neck.need be open.. 

Overall is suck service..

judul_review: “Relaxing and spacious environment. An attractive swimming pool for recgarging ernergy.”
deskripsi:
The outdoor dining area could be improved. More staff could be deployed
for breakfast.
Hotel biasa
nice place to stay, clean room, strategic location, nice view, amazing food.....
Feel  like at Desa.. Trsadisonal food. And nice staft.
Spacious room with bathtub, even in classic room. Great staff & various breakfast. Nice ambience and great interior. Best value hotel in center Surabaya.
Spacious & clean room, nice resort ambience even though this hotel located in the middle of city, excellent breakfast with very wide variety of food.

One of the best hotel in Surabaya. Offer many facilities we could enjoy, especially family with kid. Breakfast was superb, a lot of choices and great location indoor and outdoor. The room is really spacious and clean. The staff was also really friendly and helpful. Great location in the heart of Surabaya, so there were many places we can go to. Overall was great experience.

One of the best hotel in Surabaya. Great location in the heart of Surabaya. Had a child stayed with us, and the hotel offer great facilities such as a great courtyard, swimming pool and sauna, and the room we stayed is really spacious too. Staff was really friendly and helpful. The breakfast was great, many choices but the taste was just so so.  Overall, it was a great experience.
Love the hotel lobby. Huge and nice. Rooms are big as well with big bathroom. Breakfast was good too. It will be better if there is a convenient store within the hotel.
