Some equipment are aging but everything works well

The hotel was so nice. The room was so big. The breakfast was really delicious. The swimming pool  was big &it has jacuzzi.  I really like the hotel &will definitely go back to the hotel if I go to Surabaya again.
Good staff, clean room, great breakfast
Super comfortable , breakfast was good, lots of trees , its so peaceful , thank you

Facilities such as gym, sauna, pool looks very old even it seems talen care,but really need some replacement for equipments or renovation for the pool. 
Breakfast is the best as u can find many kinda foods, but the taste is just so so, not the best but ok. 
Room size is big and its good for relaxing or business!
Only few things that it should be improve due to sleeper(only one)
Room, facilities, food, services is awesome
Old style hotel but still in very very good condition. Overall we are having pleasant stay here. They also have superb and wide range choice of breakfast. Everything taste delicious.
ONe of the best value hotel in Surabaya. Highly recommended
We stayed during Ramadhan, The foods are good and have a lot of variations, the staff also good attitude
Bumi surabaya hotel gave excellent services during our stay at the hotel. One thing that impressed me is the breakfast, the traditional food buffet concept is very good.
Great location, friendly staff, excellent facilites, but the aircon was not cold enough. The hotel had it checked, but still no cold enough.

judul_review: “This is my third experience staying on this hotel. The room was clean and also big as well. ”
deskripsi: I think the hotel’s room need to redecorating. This hotel uses old decoration. I guess this hotel uses semi traditional java for every single room. Yesterday was my third experience stay on this hotel. My first was pretty well, polite staff. My second was good, not different than my first.
Good location. Good staff. Good food. Value for money.

The hotel is an old ones but well maintained. The room was spacious and clean. The bed was big and comfy. The food was superb and authentic, if you're looking for indonesian food, this is the place. Pool was great. Really enjoyed my stay.

judul_review: “Immaculate, Perfect, Flawless Accommodation right in the heart of Surabaya”
deskripsi:
The hotel is centrally located and near to all main attractions in Surabaya.
The room itself is huge and nicely designed despite the lack of lights, hence pretty dim when the curtain is drawn.
Breakfast is magnificent with wide variety of food, ranging from Japanese, Javanese/Indonesian to European and Chinese. Those who fancy European/American breakfast may be disappointed by the choices as they are not up to the standard. We were fine with it as we were not a big fan of Western breakfast and more into Asian/local one. We were so spoiled with assorted dishes such as pecal/gado-gado, bubur madura, soto, kukusan, mie/nasi goreng, wedang, etc.

Try their fried noodle (mie goreng), which will take you over the moon :).

Its surrounding with lush greenery and fish ponds are very good for those who would like to read books while sitting in a garden.

The fitness centre is very well-equipped for a hotel.
In short, our 5-day stay in this hotel was perfect.

hotel with 4 star quality, 5 star price in a less hygienic manner, like a dirty floor at the facility, there is no on off button for jakuzi. the fish pond smells and is dirty. dull wall. the age of the hotel is old and there is no renovation for the better. good variety of facilities and delicious food ,,
for 5 star quality hotels and 5 star prices on jw marriot not fairfield for surabaya, mulia for bali ..
for Eid holidays, not memorable, overpriced, and will not return .,
I review hotels with hotels, not hotels with apartments, because apartments are not for holidays ,.
It's really recommended, awesome hotel :)

judul_review: “I think the hotel was over rated , I dont think I will go there again.”
deskripsi:
The hotel reception area and others are wonderful , but inside the room it was a different story.

The restaurant  and  food choices were very much below standard.

The fridge was not working properly
.
The toilet drain was old and yellowish .

Some parts of the room were dusty .
The rooms are very well maintained, the food is very diverse, very popular with the buffet menu.  But the Sahur menu in Ramadhan isn't much variation. Overall OK and want to go back in the future.

judul_review: “Upgraded to suite but not so nice”
deskripsi:
We stayed for 4d3n at this hotel and booked Classic Room. We saw at agoda that this hotel was mentioned has kids club and kids playground which is NOT at all. The wifi is also not work at our room 2261. So we complained to the hotel management.
They decided to upgrade us into Suite room which is bigger and have access to Executive lounge every afternoon. At the beginning we were happy, then we realize that no other guess else except us present at the Lounge.
It seems not so many guest booked the Suite room.
While we are eating at the lounge, my elder kids said that she saw something that makes her afraid, I dont know, then we went out for dinner outside from the hotel.
The first night at the suite, both my kids can not sleep, and both me and my wife had goosebumps. We will never stay there again.

This is the second times I choose this hotel and the truth revealed.
Stayed for 5 nights and start to find out the real attitude of this so called "Recommended" hotel.
Had to changed rooms for 2-3 times (1. Noisy. 2. A/C not performed.) one of the rooms really smelly. 
Dirty bathroom (hair left over, dirty marked and stains at bathtub,  dirty closed lid and bowl) found at all rooms I stayed. Very basic amenities. 
FO and  House Keeping Staff not showing a 5 stars attitude or even greeting. And they seem not communicating internally. When I had extended my registration and stay the House Keeping gave my a letter to check out and settled my bill. Report all these issues to FO but not really helping. After 5 days stayed here, you'll find that break fast, dinner menu at their Restaurant serving  the same menu varieties (including local dishes) which is average in taste. 
The only good thing is they have little garden with fish ponds.

I stayed for 2 nights, they need a bit touch up in the fitness room ceiling, and cleanliness on the room details..such as under sofa mat, picture frame...etc...I expecting a clean 5 stars hotel.  But overall I feel satisfied.
The bathup, the welcoming staff, the food and the bedroom was outstanding.  Its not expensive which include the breakfast too.
Nice breakfast
The room was big enough. Breakfast had a lot of choice.

First visit to Surabaya for some golf with the wife. Everything was well set up and clean. Best dinner selection for traditional food options - even the locals eat here at night .... you wont go wrong.
Big room and clean. But the AC in my room not cool enough. Even it is a central AC. Remote TV didn't work. Perhaps the battery should be replaced. Too bad for 5 stars hotel...
staying only 1 night but very memorable. easy check in. super comfy bed and good amenities. only problem with the deposit. long released.
Don't have provided towel for swimming.

Hotel sangat tenang, bersih. Cuma buat kamar, cleaning A bit slow. 4pm not yet finish cleaning. Overall, I'm so Happy with this hotel. For sure I will suggest to all my friends and family. See you soon Bumi surabaya... #love
We’ve stayed here about 5 times and love it every time, the place is getting a bit old and weathered but it is a great value for money and right downtown

judul_review: “Spacious room, excellent, although it is an old hotel”
deskripsi: The room is spacious and has a clean bath tub, although the carpet is supposed to be changed, either wise it will be perfect. The breakfast, garden, swimming pool  are a must to visit.

When I booked their room, they didn't informed that the guest had to pay a deposit for guarantee. I knew it as I arrived at the receptionist. It'd be disturbing me because I didn't bring cash money/credit card. It could be easier when the hotel put that rules in their booking-apps.
I will definitely stay again next time if I travel to Surabaya.

This hotel is awesome.
We surely come back to stay again..
Good price from agoda , great service from the staff , friendly and warm , good pool and great jacuzzi that can be used upto 9 pm
Nice City Hotel. Spacious rooms

Really fantastic oasis of calm in the heart of busy Surabaya. Has the real feeling of classic Indonesia. Nice garden courtyard. Big comfy rooms with extensive view. Fantastic breakfast and best Nasi Goreng in Indonesia. Friendly staff. Amazing pool and jacuzzi. Wish they would offer tennis court as free facility for guests. Otherwise top choice in Surabaya.

Makanannya enak meskipun agak mahal. Fasilitas olah raga cukup lengkap.
Tamannya asri.
For all good 👍
We love this Hotel for their hospitality, location, and comfort. This is our 3rd stay and still love it. Suitable for family with younger children

Everything is okay with this hotel as great as Hyatt Regency Surabaya in late 1990. However as age as changes, need to upgrade some facilities such as offer bigger TV, USB charger, Coffee machine, Handy (for local call and city navigation), etc
Good

judul_review: “Wonderful place to stay right in the middle of the city”
deskripsi: Everything is up to my expectation.  Beautiful hotel, friendly and helpful staff, good wifi connection, tasty breakfast. and right in the middle of the city too.  Wil definitely stay at Bumi Surabaya again the next time I visit Surabaya.

We found this an excellent hotel. Everyone was very polite and friendly and always ready to help. The hotel is very well appointed. Breakfast was delightful.  Being centrally located was also a bonus. We had a wonderful time.

judul_review: “always feel like home when we stay in this hotel”
deskripsi: we always feel like at home. the staff was very polite and humble. excellent hotel.
Nice airy hotel that has a good feel to it. Piano player & his music are very welcoming. Rooms are big & beds comfortable.
Handy location to malls. Helpful staff at check in. Food in restaurant only ok as plenty of variety but not to a high standard.
Nice outdoor area to relax in. Breakfast was only ok.  Large rooms & friendly staff.

Recently completed our 4th stay at this amazing hotel. As always our stay was perfect. The  staff was so welcoming and friendly. Our room was super clean, very spacious, and the city view was great. The breakfast, as always, was delicious. As was the dining for lunch and dinner. Bumi offers a great location and a cultural experience as well. Wife and I  Love love love this hotel and will return very soon.  👍👍👍👍👍 

Brennan S.
The bed cover had holes and dirty, even when we change the room we find a similar bed cover with holes, (need renovation)
I was happy with everything during my stay here, next time I come back, and I appreciate the kindness and consideration of the staff
Very good hotel with excellent ambiance and yummy food.

In general satisfying stay. Plus point is bigger room which is rare these days unless money is thrown. Both rooms for our family given at the corner and next to each other. Negative part is the demotivated staff at the breakfast restaurant (probably because of lesser guests and the hotel is not generating much revenue!)- they don't even put the cutlery for the new diner and don't clean up the previous diner's plates at the table, even after requesting them. On the taste and variety of the food, better not to comment much as they seem to cater much for the locals. 
Read a review somewhere on stolen money/valuables from the room-safe. So, didn't put any money as used to do at other stays. It so happened that on the second day after breakfast and stroll at the garden, we found the room-cleaning service on our room at around 10.30AM with the door locked from inside although we didn't request it as we planned to put the make-up room tag at the door only after going in after the breakfast before stepping out of the hotel. Didn't raised this up though.
The garden at level 1 and at the swimming pool area is lush and a refreshing feel to relax there.

In summary, it is worth the stay if you get a good deal compared to other hotels. Location is at the central, so not much of a difference.

This was my first time stay at this hotel. Room was ok. Breakfast was ok, a little bit crowded. The pool was ok. The staffs were excellent!  Very polite! But the room key card was a nightmare. I have to go to the front desk twice because i can't use my key card. Overall it's an ok hotel. Will i go back? Maybe, if my favorite hotel in Surabaya isn't available or fully booked.
Good hotel ...

judul_review: “Old hotel but still  a 5 star in City center of Surabaya”
deskripsi: great breakfast with plenty of choices Indonesian, chinese, western and japanese meal, huge room

judul_review: “Oasis in the heart of a city”
deskripsi:
Gives you sense of tranquility. Great food and sparkling facility. Great hotel.

Love the complimentary shoe shine in the room. 

Room's amenities need to be upgraded to: more electrical plugs & USB charger. Need hair dryer in the room.

Good value for money!! 

Its an old hotel but with good maintenance. Spacious room with big comfy bed( looks like king koil). The bathroom has bedtub separated shower with good maintenance. The hotel ptovides you with local touch it has good breakfast! They have live cooking nasi goreng. If you want to find the locals dishes you just stop by the restaurant! All is good thank you
The Hotel makes you forget that you are actually abroad. The Staff's warm welcome and friendliness would make anyone's tired long-day refresh again. I am already in love with the Hotel.

i have stayed at this hotel for many years, It used to be my preferred hotel, but after last weeks experience I am done supporting them with my business.   I will explain, this is a so called 5 star hotel.   When i arrived this time,I went to the mini bar for a cool drink to find the mini bar is completely empty, I go down stairs for a swim, the pool is a milky colour, i am told the PH is at an incorrect level and they are adjusting it..  So it now around 5.30pm i think i will have a sun downer,  good luck with that, this hotel has not got its licence to serve alcohol.  What management of a 5star hotel would let a alcohol licenses expire unbelivable I know.    So i go for dinner at Casscads restaurant and think I will hot stone salmon, go with the healthy choice,  the salmon arrives I do my bit and cook it on the hot stone, ready to eat, but no its not at all, its still frozen inside.  Cant write any more the system won't allow it. BUT BE AWARE YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED
It was a very luxurious hotel with helpful staff. Unfortunately, in my room the bathroom was smelly, the breakfast menu was the same everyday, and no shuttle to the airport.

I have a good childhood memory in this hotel. I used to stay in this hotel all the time. 
Good location, marvellous ambience and friendly staffs still remain on the same standard.
But, we stayed in room 1758. This room is really old and the toilet bowl were really rough due to old age, and it was really inconvenient to seat on it. 
The room were dusty and we need to clean all the wardrobe before we put our clothes there. 
Another difficulties, one of the lift near the entrance on left hand side couldn’t serve 17th floor
Hope the management can solve this issue as soon possible

The level of customer service is outstanding. And this is when compared to other Indonesian 4-star or 5-star hotels. Service is extremely good.

Room is big and comfortable.

Swimming pool is excellent and good.

The breakfast is one of the best. It serve lots of variety of food, with emphasis on Indonesian food, something you can't get elsewhere.
Nice breakfast, friendly staff.
need view smart and natural and jet spa warm water ready at traffic customer coming at evening
Room are big,very nice hotel,breakfast qre great.

judul_review: “Good value for money in the city center”
deskripsi: It's not a real 5 stars hotel, old style and need some renovation. Nice garden and Indonesian buffet with a lot of choice. Don't expect high standards but the price paid was affordable.

judul_review: “Its value for money in every aspect. ”
deskripsi: I booked Bumi Surabaya for my trip with 7 of my friends. We are very happy with this hotel and looking forward to come and stay at Bumi Surabaya again. The staff, location, ambience and breakfast spread were so satisfying. Also, the MAS (Malaysian Airline System) is also within the hotel so that is a plus for travellers using that airline.
No complaints at all. The hotel definitely will have me as a regular guest
Rooms are spacious. Breakfast is great, full of varieties.  Staff are super friendly. Check in/out effecient

Location is great, room size complaint nothing, garden fantastic (this made me stay here), Food breakfast way too traditional compare to international standard hotel, room a bit dirty, and old. Keep it up, and thank you

judul_review: “Hotel in the middle of the city with a resort atmosphere”
deskripsi: Old hotel but well maintained. Many trees and gardens.

judul_review: “Receive damage laundry and insaulting me on business room”
deskripsi:
im staying at bumi hotel on sunday at 10feb/11feb( 1night) and received my laundry it was damage and torn in all over my clothes and underwear. I send 5 pieces laundry when night at 8pm and get back with me when near check out time almost 2pm, which supposed to be delivery on 10AM..
It was a nightmare!!Staying this hotel, the hotel staff makeup of stories on different version and denial. And ihad been BULLY and taken me to board room on business centre with 5 or 6 people hotel staff, inside they window curtain closed and closed door. 
The hotel denied of their laundry service and not want compesation as on bills and told me to call police by 12 hour.  So i come with police at 11 pm night and was there until 5am, but the hotel's staff in charge not there and the dirertor's room named anjas ,front desk supervisor named leni and housekeeping turn off the phone. And not want come to hotel.. because the bills regulation 1×12 hours to claims the damage clothes and the all staff is dissapear. So i tell this to agoda ,to contact hotel and report this case to as claims hotel responsibilities about their service
Fantastisch hotel with very good price for five star
Good & various breakfast. They joined our two rooms & provided a baby cot. All perfect.

Price are too good to be true for 5 stars hotel. Room is spacious,clean,luxury and breakfast really good with plenty of variety. TV bit small for the kind of this spacious room. But still ok. They have so many spot to chilling, by the garden or by the pool and even if u're feel not comfortable to be outdoor they also still have indoor corner which also ok for chilling.  Facilities are the bestest, all well maintain and complete! Location is exceptional!
Definitely will go back !

Very lovely room and the bed was very comfortable. They have an amazing breakfast spread of Indonesian food and some international food. Very clean and nice environment. Only thing is that you need a car to get to most places if you are staying here. There is a mall within 15 mins walk but Indonesian roads aren’t built to accommodate pedestrians  very well. Would definitely stay again

The room bit dirty .. i found so many chips on the floor also toilet .. 
the breakfast was the one interesting .. but their breakfast mapping kiosk bit untidy.

But with their good staffs .. this hotel is still recommended! 👍👍👍 and value for money! 

Keep it up!
Lost and found division was incredible and honest. I have left my smartwatch charger, they kept it and return back to me. Thank you so much
One of best hotel in town... Highly recommended
fantastic hotel with superb hospitality

Centrally located around Surabaya CBD, close to TP shopping center, the staff are very friendly and helpful. Hotel area is clean and very well decorated, room is big and nice bed and big bathroom. Hotel has tennis court (with fee) , gym and swimming pool. Nice breakfast with a lot variety of Indonesian food for breakfast and dinner.
Totally recommended
front desk staff super helpful breakfast supervisor super rude
front desk staff super helpful breakfast supervisor super rude
good value for money, front desk super helpful breakfast supervisor super rude

An oasis in the city center.
Spacious complex of the hotel, amazing greenery garden.
All staff are kind, attentive and hospital.
VALUE FOR MONEY, BUT FOR TV A BIT OLD, FOOD AWESOME,
It's a great and wonderful stay in Bumi Resort. Just love the food. So many traditional cuisines to choose. it's like staying in a "green" hotels. great atmosphere and very comfy.

Located in The Central of surabaya.
A very nice place to stay in with friendly staff.
Good food. Clean room. The staff was helpful and the location is perfect
Good Food, Nice Hotel and Hospitality Staff
Traffic is a little busy outside so arrange a bit more free time when you consider your transport.  Food is amazing. I like it.
One of the comfort hotel in Surabaya
Clean room and good taste of food
always satisfied

Nice breakfast, huge room, good atmosphere for an outdoor restaurant.
Beautiful people, very kind and helpful staff.
I love the city view from our bathtub!
Also, the fragrant in the lobby.
Good job! We'll definitely return.

judul_review: “Great hotel in the center of surabaya”
deskripsi: We enjoyed our stay. Large room with bathtub. The hotel has really nice garden with fish ponds, lots of photo spots. Great breakfast. We did have some issues with the cable tv & plumbing, but no big deal.

At the first came in to my room. Had a  bad smell. Okay.. maybe because the room had carpet floor.
But it more worst at afternoon and night..
The bathroom door cant close properly, its to heavy for kids or a woman to slide it.
The fan at toilet is broke.. imagine the room without ventilation. The bathroom door cant close either.
How worst the smell could it be.
 I try to call reception. At the first arival to report the smell problem but no one came in. My room was at 2161
 If u want to spent tjme for swim or try many culiner wit jungle concept its  okay.
I think not,  for stay over night.
Its an old hotel n clearly show it. They surely need to upgrade to be a true 5* hotel. But I got a good price from agoda, so consider the location and room space, this hotel really worth it

Big and clean room, got corner room with city and pool view. Big bathroom : hot and cold water in both bath-up and shower works well, has hair dryer, complete amenities such as soap, tooth brush, shampoo, sewing kit, etc.
AC, tea/coffee maker works well.
TV has many channels, good WiFi in room.

Good swimming pool, delicious pizza from Warung Bule (in pool area) with reasonable price. 
Complete breakfast. Newspaper in the morning sent to the room.

Indonesian instrument from gamelan or piano with the smell of lemongrass welcoming guests in the lobby area.
smooth check-in and check-out process.

Near Minimart/Indomaret (at the corner of the street) about 7 mins walking. Near Tunjungan Plaza (still needs taxi or gocar/grab).

Cake shop discount at 17.30. best deal for bread and cakes (50% off). Gellato ice cream only at Rp. 25.000,-. 

Recommended hotel in the center of Surabaya.
Good
Nice view in lobby and arround.  ALso like the aroma sereh. Variaty menu when breakfast.
the pool is need more maintenance

This hotel is beautiful, the outdoor garden are well kept, very green and neat. Breakfast was yummy, the noodle and rice section especially, he made a good nasi goreng and mie godog. The traditional kueh also very nice, as well as the soto. Our experience in this hotel was very good, and we will stay there again if we go back to Surabaya.

Perfect choice for our 3 nights stay in Surabaya. Friendly staff, clean and spacious rooms, nice javanese ambience, excellent breakfast, our kids loved the pool, modern gym, and the hotel is strategically located at the heart of Surabaya. Will be back here again for sure...

Previously stay here feel everything is good , so decide to stay again but this time feel dissapointed.
Arrived 2pm, room not ready yet and be inform only can check in at 3pm, no argue on that as the official check in time is 3pm. But the weird things is many others are allow to direct check in even though before 3pm or arrive later than us. After 3pm we keep ask for the room but the staff only said will check for us. Finally get the room at 4pm. 

The only good and maintain well is their buffet dinner, even though many people but the foods still keep refill without let empty.
My fav hotel in town. I have so great memories with this hotel. Once they give me a cake when my friend bday and give us surprise
The location good, the breakfast soo good with may choices, the taste very good especially nasi goreng

I’m a frequent traveler and this is one of my favorite hotels. Room is spacious and clean, slightly scented w lemongrass aroma, and the view of Surabaya is magnificent at night. 

Breakfast is themed on Indonesian “warung” = hawker foods and we can have it in beautiful lush garden. 

You can find Indonesian artifacts in many corners of the hotel, which makes this hotel really unique.

This hotel really deserves the name “city resort”

This property was used to be a Hyatt and maintains 5-star luxury ring with it. 

Located in CBD of Surabaya. If you don’t mind 1km walk, gigantic shopping mall (TP)  is here for you.

Gym/sauna/25m swimming pool for lap swimming/tennis court/jogging track are all there.

Couldn’t like this place more!

One of well located hotel with spacious room that have interesting breakfast area and option 
Love the entrance and lobby with the live piano music
The room it self its standard good , nothing special
Will be more lovely if they can renovated since it’s start feel bit old ( but maybe thats what make the price still very reasonable for its facility and location)

although it's old hotel, but it keeps its essence and charm. i like the smell of lemongrass when i enter the lobby, i like the javanese decoration they put across the lobby. the room is spacious, and it has clean bath tub. what i like most is its shower. it has consistent hot water and powerful stream. the room is also sound-proof, making good quality sleep. in the morning, i had breakfast at their outdoor space, it provides tall and ample of greenery for fresh air (too bad there were smokers).  the food is also great, excellent! i like it offers traditional food, like Jamu, mie nyemek, and fritters
Best hotel in town

We are happy live in this hotel 
Breakfast  very good with a lot of varian  food.
Always my favourite hotel in surabaya
Dirty carpet, water, n old future. Time to refurbish the hotel.
One best hotel in town with various traditional food..

this hotel has everything for family. Pool, sport club, good restaurant, good breakfast, and quite big garden surrounding.  Located in central Surabaya, near culinary center, not too far from tunjungan plaza and wisata rasa.
we stay here coz we have an event held in this hotel. the hotel is so comfortable, instantly feels disconnected to the city's rush. Greenery everywhere, and the restaurant is recommended too.
Food was great with a mix of local Indonesian food. However, alot of flying bugs in my room. I was bitten to death. My co-worker also had the same issue.
Strategic location, near to everywhere in Surabaya
It was nice experience.
Nice room, comfortable bed, no complain at all.
Very nice oasis in the middle of the city. Perfect for a short gateaway.

judul_review: “don't judge the book from the cover”
deskripsi: jangan melihat tamu anda hanya Karena penampilannya
Breakfast superb

Although the rooms are a little tired, this didn’t distract from an enjoyable stay. The restaurant staff and the staff at the Club Olympia (gym and pool) were wonderful. The gym had everything you could want and the pool is one of the best that I have come across in Asia. The breakfast does cater mainly for Asian clientele, but also has numerous choices for western clients. I would definitely stay here again.
A definite must go hotel in Surabaya

the ambience in the restaurant was great.A wide range of options. Room was huge and clean. Everything about our stay were perfect!

Except we had to pay for what we consumed in the room's minibar. We thought it was complimentary. Nevertheless, a great and enjoyable stay!
love this hotel
love this hotel, will come back
Much nicer than other 5 star hotels in Surabaya
All the staff are very polite and friendly, the breakfast was good and so many variety, the hotel facilities is outstanding, really recommended to stay here again

Only hotel in Surabaya that gives me a true leisure feeling. Good pool, nice gardens and places to relax.  Good food and nice garden restaurant that gives you the bali feeling. Hotel is older and the state of it can't match the newer 5 star hotels but it's still up to standard and the true leisure feelings compensates the gap.
Great breakfast serving with many local cuisine
BUMI is amazing hotel in Surabaya, especially when we are looking for Hotel with natural and healthy orientation.
Nice hotel with spacious garden and great food choices. Very recommended!
old hotel but still a nice place to stay. staffs were nice. hotel lobby, garden, and the pool look good. breakfast had various menu.
It is always my favourite hotel in Surabaya
Bumi is always nice to stay after a long hour of working...

judul_review: “Very calm and peaceful in a busy city ”
deskripsi: Huge well equipped room and bathroom with views . Gardens are beautiful . A large range of food options and some shops . Transport easy . Close to large shopping mall and other shops and eateries . Staff very helpful . Had a breakfast box ready as needed to leave Pre breakfast times for an early flight . A lovely hotel with a good feel and that great smell mentioned by others

Value for money for such a luxury hotel.
Big room come with nice breakfast.
Big wimming pool, good location in the CBD area.
Walking distant to Tunjungan Plaza.
big room, big bathroom, wide variety breakfast

I am a critical person but this time I must acknowledge that there was very little to criticize. Bumi Surabaya is a fine hotel, and I wish I could return soon. One slight complaint- the 80 rupiah charge for 1 hour intrnet use, is too high.
always satisfied
The hotel is generally excellent, its food is great, the restaurant is excellent, the staff are very helpful but overall excellent
It’s a nice hotel but need refurbishment for the rooms.
All fantastic.Thank you for bapak Anjas,Bunga,Echa and Nenny.You’re the assets of this property.Smile and your services was excellent for me.
Nice hotel to stay at.
Loved the ambience!

Spent 3 nights here and enjoyed it. Excellent breakfast buffet with huge choice. Large grounds for a city location, big swimming pools and space to walk. Very helpful staff and excellent rooms. Near to big mall.
Could be nice if the provide welcome drink and improve the variety of breakfast and dinner.

judul_review: “Extreem friendly staff,  we feel at home immediately”
deskripsi:
Is in a good location in the middle  of the city with beautiful garden. 
Facilities are very complete,  tennis court,  and swimmingpool. 
Delicious in fully equipped restaurant

Where to begin?! The room was spacious and elegant. It used to be the Hyatt Regency so you can expect all facilities associated with the brand. The ground, the garden, the pool, the foyer, the lobby and more were stylish and well maintained. This is a stylish older property. The lobby foyer was scented with the aroma of Lemongrass ... comforting. The grand piano was used in the morning and in the evening. The restaurant was great. So many choices of food. A popular destination for the local Surabayan. What more can I say? Thoroughly enjoyable stay, will be back for sure. One of the best hotel, I have stayed in Indonesia.
Best hotel in town
Nice hotel
Close to office center is best place
good
everything was perfect (even the price) - will definitely stay here again when we visit Surabaya!

judul_review: “Great Location , Great Breakfast with outdoor space , Spacious Room”
deskripsi:
Walking distance to Tunjungan Plaza , Love the resto , love sitting at the outdoor for breakfast . Plenty choices of food . 
The garden is such perfect for evening coffee of just relaxing after day activity . Room is spacious and well maintain for an old property.  Well done !
Hotel ini bersih n nyaman... Sangat bgs utk keluarga
Lovely , love this hotel so much!

Was a hyatt before, the hotel has hyatt standard facilities. The room was nicely arranged eventhough in some areas need refurbished. Lobby, hallway, resto are excellent, however it would be easier and more comfortable to muslim travellers to know the food served is halal.

judul_review: “Great experience but with one little stain”
deskripsi:
We stayed for one night only. It was pleasure staying  there. Rooms are specious. Breakfast was really good with lots of variety. 
Only one little thing I would like to mention, the hairdryer was not working properly. It was switching off after a minute of use. When we called service person he said, its like that and okay. We couldn’t use hairdryer.
selalu disini kalau ke surabaya, ada masjid dalam lingkungan hotel

Great service, great location, great room.
Just love this hotel so much

for the price we pay the hotel is the deal of the year, the people are friendly the food is great, …
The limits: it is still not prefect: It takes 20 minutes to get a cup of tea in the coffeeshop or there is a small leak in the bathroom I can not get anybody to fix, so it is perfect for Indonesia, very good in Asia but only good for a five star place in Europe, of course it costs only 15 % of it, so go for it
semua ada di hotel bumi surabaya, makanan tradisio nalnya

Bumi was great! The rooms were very spacious and de resort is fantastic. Food is wonderful. I would not recommend booking at Agoda though, because they seem to charge more for every room I booked than was noted on my booking. And their Office is unreachable. So Bumi 10 points, but Agoda.com is scam!

the breakfast was excellent, with many different kinds of food... the cafe has many different kinds of coffee for coffee lovers... pool&garden was also nice and large. Rooms were quite sound proof as well.
will be #1 place to stay in Surabaya next time

judul_review: “The hotel is cozy, comfortable stay & definitely value for money”
deskripsi:
Pro- nice breakfast buffet & hi-tea, friendly & attentive staff 

Cons- the chilling water system is under maintenance during our stay, hence the air-condition in the hotel room was affected and resulting in hot temperatures and we feel extremely stuffy and hot.

Staffs, location, breakfast are good. Bed and room are comfortable and spacious. We are from The Netherland and the Cleanliness of the room/bathroom meets European standart. hope that the management keeps do so or even increase it.  We tried Warung Senggol  and it was tasty Indonesian/local foods. We will be back!
nice hotel and everything perfect

Kamar bagus, luas dan cukup bersih. Bed yang besar, king size, cukup besar bisa untuk bertiga. Kamar mandi luas. 
Salah satu kamar yang ditempati anak (1259), AC nya sedikit rusak, suhunya hangat dan tidak bisa diperbaiki walopun sudah ada teknisi yang datang. Remote TV tidak berfungsi karena tidak ada batere-nya. 
Secara umum, dengan harga special yang diberikan, facilitas yang ada cukup pas. Hanya saja kalo berlaku rate normal akan sedikit sulit bersaing dengan tempat lain.

judul_review: “Awesome resort hotel in the middle of Surabaya city”
deskripsi: Everything was great about this hotel. Even the location in the middle of the city, but they are succeed to create a resort environment in this hotel. Once we entered the hotel, we could feel the mix Balinese and Javanese touch in this hotel. Room was big and great with spacious bathroom. The breakfast was widely spread with a lot of varieties.

Room is spacious and clean, but the furnishings may need a little updating. There's a separate bathtub and shower, which is a plus. The hotel's gym is also spacious and has adequate equipment that people do not need to queue for. However, the swimming pool is quite small and it was always crowded during our 2-night stay at the hotel.
Staff was exceptionally friendly. What we enjoyed most was the breakfast. It has soooooo many options that satisfied our cravings for Indonesian food and snacks. Yumm!
The best is the Location, in center of Surabaya, Good staff n food, recomended for Traveling with children

judul_review: “unforgettable moment during our stay in surabaya”
deskripsi: really enjoy and satisfied.

judul_review: “an amazing stay during long holiday in surabaya”
deskripsi: my familify and me really enjoy during this stay.
Please provide swimming pool for children.
Really a very nice hotel to stay, don't miss it
Room was large and quite nice, food in restaurant was delicious with plenty of options, location is nearby to city center
Beside the quality of bed, which I think, its time to be change. All facilities, breakfast, staff are value for money to stay. Very recomended
Big room and good amenities and strategically located in the city
Recomended Hotel, staff very helpfull, various foods, we really enjoy our 2 night stay here
Kamarnya luas, bersih, sarapannya lengkap dan variannya banyak menunya

It's our first time we got here, we feel really comfortable with hotel air freshener: It's seems like traditional Javanesse spices, the rooms were big enough so my daughter have enough space to play, clean, very helpfull staff, great food with various menu (Indonesian, Chinesse, Western, Japanesse food), Old fashion Hotel but really good maintained. Overall we have a blessed time to spend our Family Holiday here
staff tidak terlalu ramah. i had superb breakfast <3
lovely hotel
Bali themed hotel. Incredible breakfast and dinner. Really cool environment in the middle of the city. Aging a little but really well kept Hotel.

judul_review: “fasilitas mulai banyak yg usang perlu d perhatikan. fengsui kamar kurang bagus”
deskripsi:
Omlet ga enak.
 Japanis food too small. 

Fasilitas kolam-ada yg kotor
Air mandi/shower tdk panas
Harga ..cukup..under 1jt
breakfast was so good..

Got a free upgrade to their Classic Suite Room as they were fully booked on the Classic Room I originally booked for. Really a pleasant and welcome surprise! Staff were courteous throughout and even helped me to get small change for my taxi ride there. Facilities were clean and well maintained. Breakfast was really, really tasty. Would come back here again if I had the chance.

The hotel is well maintained although it is old. My stay was fine without any issues, the room (classic room)  that I stayed was big, wide varieties of breakfast spread and the hotel has a really nice garden.

judul_review: “It's a 5 star hotel at 3 star price ”
deskripsi: Definitely worth more than we paid for. Excellent hospitality by staff, central location and spoilt for choice breakfast option. Rooms are large. Lush landscape . It is indeed a resort in the city .
very good location and hotel

To me worth the money since facilities espesially the restaurant serve buffet of authethic indonesian food which is so convinience dont have to go out to find restaurant anymore to enjoy indonesian food.

Loved the room, smell of lemon grass in the lobby, buffet breakfast, staff's attitude, ambiance,  decorations, street food near the hotel. 

Will stay there again, if i get the chance again.

It’s a 5 star hotel and its great value for money room is located at high floor. Good panoramic view, especially when at sunrise. 

Breakfast is limited to local fare. Reasonable choices. 

Staff are very friendly and helpful. 
Strongly recommend for couples or family or traveling in group
Love it. 11/10 stars

always enjoyed my stay for a great vacation.
the room are clean and spacious.
Breakfast is the best, with wide varieties of delicious local food as well others.
Great supper as well. Safe and comfortable.
When I am there for holiday will stay here especially if I have guests first time in Surabaya.
Love the service attitude of all the staffs here

judul_review: “From lobby to dining to rooms to wifi are good!”
deskripsi: Main pool is clean, gym pool wasn't. Needs more signboards near glass doors that are unlock, near the bridge pool. Maybe a tourist map or brochuer. Thanks!
One thing that a bit annoys me is the use of traditional lemongrass as aromatherapy in the lobby..  i just dont really like the smell.. for me its too strong..
5 star classic lovely hotel. Very recommended
Relaxing stay at Bumi, with great facilities and friendly staff. Wide spread of breakfast.
Hospitality of Hotel staff is the best
Bumi Surabaya has nice facilities, excellent staff and clean room. Despite of its location in the bussiness area it has nice and green environment. Will be back to this hotel for the next trip

I was stayed for 4 days here for business trip and on day 2 I move to room 2253 together with my colleague and morning after I felt something on my right eye that swollen. Morning time I just realized that before I fell a sleep I seen kind of small bugs or cockroaches on my pillow.
Overall good but its much better is breakfast menu is rotate on daily.
Wifi connection was bad.
The hotel was big and they have big room but a little bit old. The Hotel was very green, they have a lot of plant. The breakfast variety was extra ordinary.
Beautiful hotel. Everything was great. Perhaps location was least great thing as we had to travel out by car to the nearest mall. In any case Would definitely come back to stay again
Good location, good facilities, value for money, but the internet connection was poor
Good place and strategic location to stay

I was based in Sby and been tried some 5 stars hotel during my weekend or short holiday, so far this is the best 5 stars hotel in Surabaya compared than the others. Room quite big, luxury, also the bathroom was spacious. Good taste of breakfast with many variant. Hotel staff is very friendly except some of restaurant staff who less smile and not really friendly.. Best 5 STARS HOTEL in Surabaya.
A lovely hotel with a resort evironment in the middle of a city with lots of greenery and squirrels, chickens running playfully. It reminds me of my younger days.

Money is worth to spend here although I came at 3pm for check in and I needed to wait half an hour cause the room was not ready yet. It is also suitable for guests who would like to experience nature in the heart of Surabaya as 2nd metropolitan city in Indonesia. They provide a unique concept for breakfast, local food stalls with various menu that people can choose.
Good location, beautiful grounds and breakfast dining area.  Room was large and came with a large bed (upon request).  Generally quiet and peaceful.  Good hotel for business travelers.
This hotel is full of Javanese atmosphere, which leads visitors into an exotic style of Life on Java Island!
I love the food here, price is amazingly fair for a 5* hotel. the rooms are clean and the layout is good.  i will definitely come again

A sanctuary in the center of chaotic madness!  The welcoming door hails  you with pungent scent stretching inside the entire building!  The service was polite and friendly.  Offers variety of Indonesian cuisine and on the go breakfast cereals, bread and some regular Japanese deli.  Live sound of the piano serenade the morning hour in the entire stretch lobby area and across the coffee shop.   Swam at the big pool and have a water massage while floating!   You could jog around the tennis court area where the rays of morning sunshine could easily get you sweat  or need more workout to tone your physique at the gym.  Felt the airy ambiance of the trees rhythmically swaying  as I sat in one of the benches  along the garden of ponds with luxuriant vegetation of plants and ferns and adding to its charm are crafted peaceful and beautiful images.  It was really a refuge in a rather rundown and gritty part of Surabaya!
Great place for families
It’s my second to this hotel, and the fragrance  of the air still the same.. really like the smell. And so many variation of food when breakfast, love it..

I always enjoy my stay at Bumi, formerly Grand Hyatt. The room is spacious although signs of aging is reflected anywhere. The management need to consider refurbishments in some areas of the hotel, for instance the Olympus' Spa area. But overall good value for money.
Facilities of this hotel quite well maintained even the hotel a bit old. Breakfast and All you can eat lunch or dinner is worthwhile considering the price.

As soon as you arrive in the hotel you smell the difference to every hotel you have ever stayed in. Lemon Grass perfumes the area. 

The rooms are sublime, even the Classic. Large room, huge bathroom and dressing area. 

The spa is very good and the pool large and sparkling clean.

Now the restaurants. Firstly the coffee shop is very good. Excellent variety of cakes and coffee. The main dining area is split into regional zones, Indonesian, Japanese, Chinese and European. All excellent. I recommend the buffet, a huge range of choose from all the zones at bargain prices for a 5 star. Breakfast is a delight. 

The main shopping area is about 15 minutes walk up the street and there are many banks and ATMs along the way. 

I can not recommend this place enough. It's the only place in Surabaya to stay.
Good location, garden is fantastic, big room with nice bed, breakfast with a lot of options but not with  great taste, many facilities in this hotel.
always comes back here...
always recommended
always satisfied

Great hotel with excellent breakfast and attentive staff.  Great sense of space...THE HOTEL  is old and so the accessibility to power outlets is the only irritation but otherwise, a great hotel to stay in
Great place with great cullinary experience

judul_review: “Good location. Good price. Good environment. Love the spacious and pool view room. ”
deskripsi:
The hotel has natural garden. Time to refresh!
The staffs are very nice.

Nice swimming pool, (except one or two smoker(s)☹), with big table chess and traditional game called "dakon" at the pool side. Love the Pasar Malam resto and its menus as well.

We'll be back to this hotel with my whole family someday. Promise.

judul_review: “old hotel but nice. Spacious room, good service, nice breakfast, good location”
deskripsi: old hotel but nice. Spacious room, good service, nice breakfast, good location
nice hospitality in Surabaya..., very recomended,  facitily and price are worth it
Bumi resort is very nice hotel with good location, very big room, clean, and good breakfast too....

judul_review: “Beautiful hotel that decorated with flowers and greenery ”
deskripsi: The receptionists are beautiful and with great hospitality! Hotel room is clean and comfy. 👍🏼  The breakfast buffet is the thing you wouldn’t want to miss out, they served more than 50 variety of foods, both western and Asian, especially the Indonesian foods was served and presented along the corridor, it’s authentic and educational!

Second visit and certainly wouldn't be the last.
Attentive staff (they always responded promptly), well maintained building, very clean rooms, nice swimming pool, delicious and wide spread breakfast. 
Only downside is the Spa room lack of facilities, too old. Need renovation. But the therapist are really good.
Other than that, everything perfect.

Hotel surroundings were very serene. Food in hotel was excellent with a wide varieties. The swimming pool was also well kept and I enjoyed the open jacuzzi at the pool area. Staff were very helpful. Hotel is also walkable distance to the biggest shopping mall. 
Only problem is that the hotel is really gloomy during the rainy season.
nice hotel with very large room,good location near tunjungan plaza,amazing breakfast
Very nice garden. Interesting buffet breakfast and buffet dinner spread at reasonable price.

Despite being an old establishment - previously Grand Hyatt, place is still beautiful. Lemongrass scent hits you the moment you reach the lobby. Check in/out was fast and seamless. Hotel even done up the room for my parents 30th anniversary upon my special request at booking. Breakfast buffet was great yummy spread. Pool is clean. Overall great stay.

judul_review: “Fantastic Resort int he middle of Surabaya city”
deskripsi:
I love the food here,  if you are looking for an authentic Indonesian and Surabaya food, this is the place. I like sitting in the green garden while enjoyed my delicious range of indonesian  breakfast style. 
Rooms is large and very well maintain. Staff is so friendly and always smile make you feel welcome. i will definitely come back again and stay at least for a week. Keep up the good work.
The room is big but looks old....the cleaning service staff so lazy to clean up the room,because we can see from the carpet was dirty (got some rubbish) when we first checked in.
Will definitely come back.

lokasi hotel bagus, konsep kamar model lama tapi bagus dengan adanya bath up di sisi kamar mandi.
sayangnya konsep fitness center kurang, dan kolam renang di dekat fitness center sepertinya tidak terurus.
konsep dari sarapan pagi bagus, namun rasanya kebanyakan adalah plain, tidak berani main di bumbu.
very good hotel and breakfast is great...
Nice atmosphere, friendly staff and great food
very nice, kind and caring staffs, great breakfast buffet
Nice staff and complete facilities
Overall recomended for family vacation.
The staffs are all friendly. The hotel is very clean

On day one only two bottle water served in the room (normally hotel will serve two bottle water in the room and two bottle water in the bathroom), no small towel (normally there are two small towels) in the bathroom and safe was locked. On day two, room service managed to changed the bedsheets and check the refrigerator content, managed to fix the safe problem. On day four, hotel provided small towel in thr bathroom. 
Did they forget to check and change any hotel amenities when guest checked out???

judul_review: “Large room, great breakfast and wonderful staff”
deskripsi: Truly enjoyed the stay at Bumi Surabaya. The staff were simply wonderful. They gave us such a great experience from the check in to the housekeeping. Strongly recommended and will certainly check in if we are in Surabaya in the future.

judul_review: “Good for business traveler and family with young pr old children”
deskripsi: Toilet need a little renovation for shower, flash etc because it’s too old
really great experience
Placed in the middle of the surabaya city, friendly staff, cozy room, a lot of choice for the traditional breakfast menu.
Definitely on my top list in surabaya. Spacious room,childrens love the bathup. Very nice buffet breakfast or dinner. Enjoy the 3rd floor facilities with pools,gym,sauna.

judul_review: “Great garden in the middle of the city”
deskripsi: The best part is the dining room, so spacious, natural, with so many choices of food. Swimming pool is also great. It has a perfect length and depth. So we really can swim.

judul_review: “Everything was fine except the Aircon stopped working 2 hours before checkout”
deskripsi: Definitely value for money but these still a lot of room for improvement

It's a beautiful resort like hotel. Everybody was so friendly right from the Security Guards to the Managers. We stayed for 5 days. Unfortunately my wife suffered an acute food poisoning and fainted in the last day of our stay. A lot of people in the restaurant came to help and also the duty Manager.  A BIG thank you from the bottom of our hearts to those who helped out.  
We had to leave at 5:00am to catch our early flight to KL. They even delivered our breakfast to the room. My wife  had to eat something to regain her strength. Upon arrival KL, she was admitted in a local hospital. She's fine now.  We enjoyed our stay besides the mishap, it's just so unfortunate. Bumi Surabaya is a good hotel, to all readers please go ahead to  book this hotel.  
My advise is when in Surabaya use UBER or GRAB to move around.
We will come back soon.

judul_review: “Breakfast are very nice and a lots of options”
deskripsi: This is a resort in the middle of busy city. Recommended for business and family, if you have activity in the center of the city. Enjoy the breakfast! various food!
Will stay again for next visit to Surabaya
Everything was great, i often stayed in this hotel

judul_review: “Very nice and lots of breakfast options”
deskripsi: Bumi Surabaya provides spacious room. Fitness centre and pool also good. Centrally located in business area, shopping area. I appreciate the breakfast buffet that provide a lot of various foods.

The staff were very very friendly and super helpful. The room was superb and the bathroom was simply beautiful. the bathtub was huge too! 

it’s very accessible to many places and the breakfast served was nice. it was cool to have them serve the food in carts — very unique! 

i cannot give enough praises for this hotel. everything was wonderful. even the view from our room! would stay here over and over again.

Bumi Hotel and staff have always given us the most relaxing and hospitable stay. This is our go to place for weekend escapes. Flowers and  petals nicely set up to welcome us in our room. The view of the city is fantastic. Conveniently located, close proximity to malls and restaurants.
I loved everything about this hotel. Nice walking grounds and relaxing atmosphere, large room with comfortable bed. Breakfast is also good.  Need to improve queueing up for breakfast to find seats
The hotel has a very good garden where we can use as jogging area every morning, good location and has a good quality and variety of foods
Nice, cozy, green and very enjoyable eventhough the place is in the city center but it looks like in the remote area.
great breakfast......
Great
Great
Been at this hotel many times and everything is good. The room was big, the bed is also big.
Love this place❤️
I have stayed at Bumi in Surabaya a few times always a good experience

My 2nd visit to Bumi and i still love the comfort and friendliness of all the staff.
I will continue to stay in Bumi for future visits to Surabaya.

judul_review: “This hotel wonderful, the number one hotel in surabaya”
deskripsi: No complain about the the hotel, facility staff food very the best really recommendation if some one in surabaya
We'll go back for sure.

judul_review: “This hotel has the best breakfast in indonesia”
deskripsi: The hotel is old but its well maintain and it has big swimming pool. Its has garden that u thought u r in countryside. Lovely garden. The room has smell and problem with key acess that i have to go down many time to update the card.  The hotel breakfast is the best, complete and fresh food.  Overall excellent hotel for old hotel. Not many old hotel is still in excellent condition like this hotel
Awesome
Good hotel... Breakfast ok... Location is strategis...
Very Good
Great
I had a satisfied breakfast because many options provided. The room is spacious. They also have large swimmingpool and sauna.

judul_review: “Excellent City Resort with Regency Hotel Style in downtown of Surabaya”
deskripsi: I spent a night staying here along with my family and it was good. Ambience was superb with the heritage touch of Javanese. We love the herbs scent in the lobby. Room was okay but the cleanliness was not good enough, view was beautiful as we stayed on the high floor. I spent a night before new year's eve yet the overlooking city view through my room gave me amazing experience since I could see many skyscaper buildings and hotels nearby which I found this hotel was taller to observe the downtown of Surabaya. We could even see the beautiful lights ignited through the Suramadu Bridge at night over my room. Bathroom was opulent with 90 percents of marbles and the touch of wood on the bathtube. I found it was fancy when I could have a tiny space to sit down during the shower time as they provided it inside the shower room.  Staffs were okay but the service was slow during check-in. There were several people to greet you before check-in but they didn't help to proceed but they were nice.
Not a new hotel but quiet and seems well run

Room, facility and the view from my room is very awesome !
The food for breakfast is great too, because they have any kind of traditional and western food,
So if you looking for a hotel in the heart of the city and still has a green space,
You better choose this Hotel 
It's good for children too

Room, facility and the view from my room is very awesome !
The food for breakfast is great too, because they have any kind of traditional and western food,
So if you looking for a hotel in the heart of the city and still has a green space,
You better choose this Hotel 
It's good for children too

Upon stepping into the hotel grounds, I experienced an immediate sense of tranquility and relaxation, despite it being located in the city centre. The hotel staff were polite and helpful, and the facilities were as described. The breakfast was great too.  In all, I enjoyed my stay.

Just don't stay here. Find another hotel. 
They have extremely poor customer service. 
They do not answer emails when given the opportunity to respond to my complaint. 
Booked 2 rooms 3 nights. Charged 120000 rupiah for motorcycle parking for 2 of these nights. Extra folding bed 1 night 565000 rupiah. Ridiculous given that room rate for 2 including breakfast is 800000 rupiah. Overpriced hotel in every way, shape and form. 
Soft drink 193ml ( small ) 60000 rupiah. 
Given that I spent 8 million rupiah at these premises, you would expect that parking a motorcycle would not be charged. I travel in Asia extensively and have never been charged parking before. 
They are money grabbing grubs . 
Show some respect for your customers. 
Oh and by the way. They forgot to deliver the extra bed. POOR POOR POOR

judul_review: “Beautiful hotel with wonderful staff and great breakfast”
deskripsi:
The hotel ambiance is something to look forward to. Wonderful staff to assure you are well taken care of. Varities of Good food assure your satisfaction. 
However, the Spa can be improved especially the masseurs.

judul_review: “Very pleasant atmosphere serviced by excellent staff”
deskripsi: But the maintenance team has to keep up from the property getting old

judul_review: “I will stay again in this hotel !”
deskripsi: Everything is already excellent only the accessories at the bath room could be better...

Loved this hotel and it's very value for money for a 5-star rated hotel. You can get good prices. Located right in the city center with plenty of places to go around. Despite being in the middle of the city, the landscape and surrounding of this hotel makes you feel like you are in a secluded nature area.
Everything is good such as food, cleanliness, large room, staffs and love the tropical garden even with chicken running around.

judul_review: “best value for money 5 stars hotel in surabaya”
deskripsi: big clean room, lots of variety of food for breakfast, interior and exterior design are lavish and well maintained; staffs are well trained, helpfull and polite. definetely i will stay again in this nice resort hotel.

Stranded in bali left only one way out via Surabaya - this hotel was great fantastic settings, excellent food whether al a carte or the street village buffet - breakfast lovely - and the staff were truly helpful at all times - well recommended

judul_review: “Great stay in Bumi Surabaya City Resort”
deskripsi: There are plenty of things I like about this hotel. It's their spacious room, comfortable bed & bedding, strategically located in the heart of Surabaya,  with a lot of breakfast selection.  Definetely will come back in my futur visit to Surabaya
The room is very big, comfortable bed, clean bathroom with bathtub. Delicious breakfast.

judul_review: “Excellent hotel, with exceptional service and prime location ”
deskripsi: I booked here because of the location and the great reviews that I read. I was surprised with the excellent service of the hotel staff and the food as well as the good location if you are in Surabaya to do business. I highly recommend this hotel
will be back :)

We had 2 days stay great service from beginning to he end 
 Restaurant manager was good at giving information and suggested what's on offer 
 We decided to eat in the Primavera restaurant which was private and away from big wedding dinner party 
Breakfast box was good and prompt 
The whirlpool unfortunately is too hot to be comfortable so did not use it again 
 Would be nice if the cold pool is a bit warmer for relaxing in 
Otherwise all facilities are great 
Nice garden to walk around in hotel vicinity 
Very near to shopping centre
Location is in the central city, Hotel’s room space quite big, the buffet breakfast got so many varieties, it really worth with the price.

The hotel got a very wise location. I was so lucky, the price in Agoda much cheaper than any other website, because Agoda got 10% discount at that time. The difference price range  quite high with other websites.

Big space, natural, comfortable, warm hospitality.  Many choices for breakfast.
Everything was good.
If i had a chance to Surabaya, will becoming my preferred hotel.
Excellent Food

Tried this hotel for the first time, was quite sure this hotel would not be disappointing, and yes, it was beyond expectations. From the moment I checked-in and greeted with the friendly staffs, escorted to the elevator, entering the big and spacious room and large bathroom with bath tub and separated shower, comfortable beds and pillows, and oh so many varieties of breakfast menu to choose from, this hotel lived up its 5 stars rating.

Would love to stay at this hotel again in the future.

judul_review: “5 Star Hotel with Great Value for Money”
deskripsi:
Almost every time I came to Surabaya, I stayed in this hotel. Dinner meal is excellent, you can have various street food style of Jawa Timur dishes. Spacious and clean room. Location is great, situated in Jalan Basuki Rahmat. Tunjungan Plaza is just 10 minutes of walking from the hotel. The famous Zangrandi old-skool ice cream restaurant is also nearby.
Highly recommended!
Garden and breakfast top . Real good

I love this hotel. Everything is excellent for me. The wide variety of breakfast, the spacious room, nice ambience, nice lemongrasss fragrance. I  stay on the 22nd floor so the view is amazing as well.  I definitely will come to this hotel again for sure

first time check in receptionist was too arrogant no smile with the tired tone when replying. wasnt expected in a 5 star hotel. when tried to open the door the card wasnt working!so have to go down again to reception. the room was nice  except the water thermos so dirty ! tea spoon only one??slippers only one?? what kind of standard is that? bed cover sheet with holes?? last one bfast was good so many varieties miss only staff need to be well trained for service the guests no smile just simply clean thr plates without asking just like in padang restaurant no differents.chefs in all outlets inside and outside restaurant no smile flat face.just wondering are these people get trained or not??!?? only chefs that take care of fruits, sushi, breads are very friendly polite smile! 
over all better less staffs than more staffs but not good manner and attitude , its a 5 stars hotel or you make it 5stars quality or 3stars quality!

Pro 
Good breaksfast and the dinner buffet are fantastic..

Con
Need to walk a bit to nearest tunjungan plaza..
Food is taste good, room is quite ok, and staff was very friendly. They have dinner and lunch buffet that was awesome

Bumi Surabaya Hotel's staff is very excellent in everything they serve to us. This is our parents wedding anniversary and the staff give a very very excellent welcome to our parents. They did a decoration to our parents room and gave a special cake with Wedding Anniversary written there.
Great job and will absolutely recommend to my friends, family and colleague.
I frequently stay in this hotel because of Service and Location, Food also nice...

Once you step into this hotel you already can feel the coziness , aromatic smell and good greenery landscape surrounding the hotel makes you feel relax, room is clean and big, staffs are friendly and helpful, f&b outlet serving variety of good food, buffet dinner is a must try, well maintained and managed hotel, definately will come back again.
Our favorite hotel in the city...
Nice to stay, nice breakfast.
Large rooms,  great breakfast,  helpful staffs, would like to stay here again.
good service, good location, nice herb smell at lobby, clean room, and variety breakfast: traditional food and international buffet.

I have problem with stain. i found stain here and there from carpet to glass table, which like a simple issue but i clean better than them especially for the glass table that easier to manage other than carpets. 

if you manage to stay along the day, better find newer place which you could expect to get cleaner place. for bed and breakfast you could consider this hotel as the food is quite delicious

i consider to stay at this hotel because it's seems like a warm place to stay, but i didnt feel that way during my stay. i carry all my bags from drop off to the lobby without any help offered by the staff. Checked out smooth but take longer time because staff less focus as during the process they also talk to other customer in line queueing. I ask the cleaner to remove the stain in the glass table that stays there since i arrived but it's still there. i could remove better than them using chemical remover product to my own furniture at home. How come?! 

good thing is, the place is well located in the center, easy to manage getting around the city and the restaurant is quite well known for having a good taste. 

so, in short, hotel are good to bed n breakfast, but if u manage to stay and relax in the hotel, better choose the newer one.

The hotel located in prime location in Tunjungan area walking distance to Tunjungan Mall, best value for money! Room is spacious, clean & tidy. Free WiFi is available with fast & stable connection. Must try Pasar Senggol & Pasar Malam buffet lunch & dinner, with really affordable price we can enjoy wide selections of Food & Beverages from Indonesian Food to Chinese & Japanese.
We have stayed at this hotel now twice and will stay again whenever we go to Surabaya, the breakfast is so great, staff so polite and helpful, swimming pool great, just a great hotel!

Definitely will back again to this hotel

Also, you need to walk fast through the lobby if you want to minimize your intake of lemon-scented cleaning fluid. It is always there.


Pool is nice and mostly unused by guests while we were there.

Our floor was the 20th and had a drying paint smell our entire stay. 

Hotel rooms with parts of the wall unpainted and ugly carpet stains are not even 4-star and certainly not 5-star. The room is good size and has a separate tub apart from the shower. This is very useful with young children.

deskripsi: THe service was very nice and attentive. The best thing about the hotel is the outdoor garden which is beautiful.  There is a bar in the garden and a fantastic buffet served at every meal.  It was a very pleasant place to unwind after a long day.

judul_review: “Top Notch Class Service and Impeccable Stay”
deskripsi:
New Year has always been moment full of celebrations, due to the fact that not only people all around the world would be saying farewell to the old year & celebrating the new year; but because my parents' anniversary is on that special day.

Everything arranged prior our New Year getaway. 
Made the booking via Agoda, I selected this hotel after a few reads of 5 star hotel choices.
My priority was to get a hotel withing the city center, walking distance to shopping malls and some of tourist destinations, with bigger sizes of rooms in a cultural and nature surrounded hotel environment. Bumi Surabaya City Resort has it all.

It was a smooth & fast check in even with the NY's eve hectic-ness at the front office. I arranged prior to our arrival, a surprise anniversary arrangement for my parents with a hotel team,  kindly confirmed my special requests.
Then during our check in, I discreetly reconfirmed my request to the hotel AsFoM, who made every detail of my plan come true later that night.

The rooms are spacious with King size beds where linen comforters really feel silky against your skin when you rest at night.
AC is with the right temperature at your finger tips, and wifi connectivity at no faulty.

Bathrooms are large and bright. Big mirrors,separate bathtubs and shower area.
Bath amenities are not too bad. 

F&B, well this is also the important part of a hotel service... and the F&B team did a great job!
So, if you are looking for a place to spend your holiday with assurance, this hotel could meet your expectation. Just don't forget to let them how they could help you make your stay fabulous :)

Special recognition and thanks to those I mentioned above, and for the rest of the hotel staff who made our stay memorable and truly SPECIAL.
Location are in the city center, good hotel, great room and good food
GOOD HOTEL , VALUE FOR MONEY , LOCATION NEAR TUNJUNGAN PLAZA , ROOM SIZE
cleanliness and service of the hotel is fantastic. the food was awesome. spacious room too!

This is our second time here. 

We purposely requested to stay here since last visit was very satisfying. We have the choice of staying at the more recognised Brand Hotel such as the Marriott or Shangrila but for me the Bumi offers just that much more in personalised service and as a business traveller it really does make the difference. This hotel has that traditional look but has that modern twist too. The service is very pleasant and very friendly. From the receptionist to the room boy will help you as best as they can anytime you want it. The room is very spacious, consists of three parts, the bed, the wardrobe, and the bath with a bathtub in it. Comfortable room, comfortable bed. The bathroom also got a view to the scenery outside. Food is yummy, breakfast has a lot of variety. Aside from business, you also feel like as if you are having a holiday here. Overall, it is one of the best hotel in Surabaya and very recommended!

Staff were friendly and helpful, and all-in-all, this is a hotel I would definitely come back to

judul_review: “Good Hotel, not so good food selection”
deskripsi: I stayed in a Junior Suite for the New Years eve.  The view was exceptional with the wall to wall window.  The room was large and comfortable.  The hotel is well decorated, with large garden.  The only thing that put me off was the hotel wanted to charge US$35+ for regular Indonesian food if we wanted to order in.  You can get those food for $5 in regular restaurant, or $10 in other 4/5 star hotels.  I know it's New Year eve and the hotel want to make some money, but the price is just highway robbery and I can't believe a high end hotel like this would want to make a few buck but completely destroy customer service or perception of the hotel.  But other then that, the Hotel is satisfactory.
