i always think of this hotel whenever i come to Surabaya.

judul_review: “Dirty hotel with unfriendly and incompetent staff ”
deskripsi:
room super dirty
key cards dont work and need to be updated every day 3x just so I can enter my room
my daughter cut her whole leg bloody from sharp broken tiles in the pool, garden is beautiful but full of mosquitos & 
WIFI doesn't work. 
staff are incompetent, impolite and not trained. 
I am super disappointed and do not recommend to stay there. 
This is certainly no 5 star resort. 

needs cleaning, upgrading, repair and most of all staff training

judul_review: “Dirty hotel with unfriendly and incompetent staff ”
deskripsi: this is nothing like 5 stars..
Very good hotel. Various menus for breakfast. Nice city view. Large room.

judul_review: “Best hotel in Surabaya with reasonable price”
deskripsi: Facilities(Gym, swimming poll, tenis arena, jacuzi) , Staff , Location , Breakfast , all Perfect.
What more can I said but that everything was Great!! You must check out their dinner for one price and eat from 6pm to 10pm at all three restaurant.

We really enjoyed our time here. The pianist playing in the hotel lobby was heavenly and the outdoor area was great. Could have done with an a la carte menu for dinner as we didn't want a buffet more than one breakfast and one dinner, and there were no restaurants near by. 
The room was clean and in good condition apart from some water staining in the bathroom.
Old building, but they do a good job maintaining it. Rooms can use renovations, but overall good. Breakfast is champion
I enjoyed having to try varieties of food for my breakfast. The staff is very helpful and the hotel is very clean. Overall it was a nice experience.
So far ok

judul_review: “Good service from Hotel, especially for breakfast is very good”
deskripsi: Cons : need improvement for Wifi Internet Connection

judul_review: “Big and clean room, breakfast and pool was Very Nice.”
deskripsi: The room is big and clean. I love the pool, breakfast which vary. I'd love to stay here again.

judul_review: “spacious room, lot of breakfast menu choices, warm and welcoming staffs, great facilities”
deskripsi: local and traditional menu mixed with oriental and western for dinner only pay US$15
Nice hotel
short business trip with amazing ambience. will back to this hotel in next trip.
Good Location, awesome Breakfast, good service

judul_review: “Nice hotel and location in center of city”
deskripsi: Very complete breakfast menu. The bedrooms are spacious and very comfortable.
The best hotel breakfast in town
They might want to trim some trees in the garden.
4 day business trip to attend a conference here. the staff were very helpful & friendly
Just lovely

Even though this hotel has been around for a long time, I love the feel of the java-bali ambiance... 
Hotel is clean, spacius, and a nice friendly staff
A place with a lot of delicious Indonesian food..

Pro : Best value for 5 star class hotel, good variety of food and taste 

Cont: No children area at swimming pool
everything ok..we're vey satisfied

judul_review: “I had a severe case of diarrhea and vomitting after I ordered room service (fish and chips).  ”
deskripsi:
I stayed in the hotel from dec 24 to 26, 2016. I had the food poisoning in the evening of dec 25.  It ruined my christmas. When I checked out the following day, I almost passed out and continued vomitting in the parking lot. I had to struggle to drive home.

I was not able to complain to the hotel manager as I was very weak and feeling faint.
Good Location, Clean, Nice staff
Best staying
room is spacious
Good Food and comfy ;D
IT WAS VERY CONFORTABLE
This is my 3rd times and it gave me same experienced, perfection.
Various Choice of Breakfast
warm hospitality, nice staff, clean and comfortable
Lobby lounge close at 10pm..... no other drinking place in hotel.
Nice and friendly atmosphere hotel.
Hotel is very clean and staff very friendly.
Stayed one night here to attend friend's wedding in Surabaya. Hotel is luxurious, very clean and comfortable. Shame that I didn't get the chance to enjoyed the hotel facilities.
worth the money, good location
Very Good

judul_review: “big room and well facilitate hotel, 5 star rated”
deskripsi: Will come back again

whenever i had a chance to Surabaya, Hotel Bumi is becoming my preferred hotel. this time with family, however the hotel should be more friendly to small kids as they lack of kids facilities. overall, love this hotel look fwd to comeback.

judul_review: “Nice hotel in the heart of the city”
deskripsi: We had a good time in Bumi Surabaya City Resort, breakfast was good and varied and very nice hospitality.
Big space, natural, comfortable...suitable for family
Everything was good
Was a nice place with a nice room and a nice service.

The greatest breakfast i ever had. Nice and helpful stuff (late checkout without any extra coast), big and clean rooms. Quiet hotel, Great gym, big pool and nice tennis court. Definitely a must see hotel!
pleasant
Food and hospitality
Surabaya downtown, Clean room, food was nice.

judul_review: “Food was really awesome at Indian restaurant”
deskripsi: Food was really awesome at Indian restaurant, room was big and comfortable
Stay was comfortable....
Resort was nice but location was average
All great, too bad they dont have free shuttle like other hotels nearby
Breakfast food is delicious and many choice, nice location, friendly staff, worth for money

judul_review: “An oasis in the middle of Surabaya”
deskripsi: It was splendid, I thought this hotel was a mere standard hotel, but I was suprised with the meals provided. Breakfast was superb, the dinner was extravaganza. It just wow

HBS truly lives up to its five-star status. I definitely enjoyed my second stay there during the end-of-year's and new-year's holiday of 2016. There's nothing more I could say with respect to HBS's excellence in the areas of staff performance and food quality. Keep it up, HBS!
I enjoyed my stay here very much!Service was prompt and efficient. The gym was very well-e

Despite a few problems, namely failure to clean room one day without a pressing reminder, rejection of signing for dinner buffet as a room charge), management at least tried their best to rectify the situations.  Not a five star experience, but they do try.

judul_review: “Five stars hotel with four stars budget ”
deskripsi: Wonderful. I spent 2 nights with family. When I check out, my family said that too short for spending in hotel. They want more nights.
The first we had try the best impression we got
The service is excellent and thumbs up for the cleanliness.
It is truly a five-star hotel. Great selection of food in the restaurant (with affordable buffet option),sizable swimming pool, and strong internet connection.
stay was good
Very good, and love to stay in this hotel. Value for money
I am very happy and convinience stay in this hotel, Overall, it was a great stay.
Had a very comfortable stay. Proximity to main attractions makes it so much better
Food, Service and Location
I only ever had breakfast at the hotel which was more than adequate.
I only ever had breakfast at the hotel which was more than adequate.
Very enjoyable stay ,our room had a fantastic view of the city
Great breakfast, good location, old hotel with good maintenance, good room size
Pleasant stay. However, convenient charging points have to be added in the room for mobile phones, ipods etc. The door to the shower cubicle should be made leak proof.
Good location on city center near to everywhere, good breakfast and comfortable room

They're doing better now - the hospitality.
And they keeps maintaining the cleanliness and comfort. As for the buffet dinner, there are many options but we think that the quality of the food and taste needs to improve a little bit.
stay was good, hotel staff was friendly
Food, Location and hotel service
Centrally located, good service, comfort bed room and nice ambiance
It is a very nice hotel, but it badly needs a good bar to be a really top hotel in Surabaya.
Average. Some trouble getting service by telephone...likely a language problem.

Our stay in Bumi Surabaya was great!
We love the room, it's clean and spacious.. The hotel staff was also friendly.. The food was super..
Can't wait to spend another day here at Bumi Surabaya..

- Genius ideas for restaurant with so many eastern and western food menu
- Clean and fresh smell environment 5 stars hotels with kind receptionis staff performances
- Need a litle bit renovation for make it more like a new hotel
An extremely comfortable stay!

I was so glad and missed my time in Bumi Surabaya City Resort, i checked in there on 17, May, and suprisingly got a birthday cake the next day , 18, May which is written in the Passprot. I was so touched and happy that i really wanna say great thanks to the girls who work in the reception, you were so kind.  Yeah, Perfect Hotel.
Very pleasent, staff performance is nice. Breakfast in Garden but please you need to ask for knife

judul_review: “Wonderful Resort Hotel in the central of busy city”
deskripsi: Our Stay in Bumi Surabaya is great. The garden is great, the pool is great and also with jacuzzi and the food is best... Nice room and view also in the higher floor...
I really like Bumi Surabaya although only 2 night I stay there but it's so fantastic.
The Breakfast is good but can be much better, the breakfast was served at the garden!! Room is spacious but hotel looks little bit old
The staff were generally friendly and helpful, Great Location and Great Facility

Paid in advance but demanded our credit card be charged before we could get our room. Employee at the front desk said ALL hotels do this but we've stayed in much better hotels than this without such a requirement.

Hotel entrance to the Elevators is a very long walk, especially carrying a two year old. You are forced to walk the entire length of the hotel every time you wish to leave. Also, you need to walk fast through the lobby if you want to minimize your intake of lemon-scented cleaning fluid. It is always there.


Pool is nice and mostly unused by guests while we were there.

Our floor was the 20th and had a drying paint smell our entire stay. 

Hotel rooms with parts of the wall unpainted and ugly carpet stains are not even 4-star and certainly not 5-star. The room is good size and has a separate tub apart from the shower. This is very useful with young children.

Overall a disappointing hotel. Really expected a lot better based on their rating.
Staff came to check but i dont know itbis real check. I lose my charger iphone here. Environment good nice location. Food have only local food. 1 hour from airport.

Need variation for breakfast
Good, breakfast standart.

judul_review: “Charming place to relax after a day of business”
deskripsi: THe service was very nice and attentive. The best thing about the hotel is the outdoor garden which is beautiful.  There is a bar in the garden and a fantastic buffet served at every meal.  It was a very pleasant place to unwind after a long day.

judul_review: “Top Notch Class Service and Impeccable Stay”
deskripsi:
New Year has always been moment full of celebrations, due to the fact that not only people all around the world would be saying farewell to the old year & celebrating the new year; but because my parents' anniversary is on that special day.

Everything arranged prior our New Year getaway. 
Made the booking via Agoda, I selected this hotel after a few reads of 5 star hotel choices.
My priority was to get a hotel withing the city center, walking distance to shopping malls and some of tourist destinations, with bigger sizes of rooms in a cultural and nature surrounded hotel environment. Bumi Surabaya City Resort has it all.

It was a smooth & fast check in even with the NY's eve hectic-ness at the front office. I arranged prior to our arrival, a surprise anniversary arrangement for my parents with a hotel team,  kindly confirmed my special requests.
Then during our check in, I discreetly reconfirmed my request to the hotel AsFoM, who made every detail of my plan come true later that night.

The rooms are spacious with King size beds where linen comforters really feel silky against your skin when you rest at night.
AC is with the right temperature at your finger tips, and wifi connectivity at no faulty.

Bathrooms are large and bright. Big mirrors,separate bathtubs and shower area.
Bath amenities are not too bad. 

F&B, well this is also the important part of a hotel service... and the F&B team did a great job!
So, if you are looking for a place to spend your holiday with assurance, this hotel could meet your expectation. Just don't forget to let them how they could help you make your stay fabulous :)

Special recognition and thanks to those I mentioned above, and for the rest of the hotel staff who made our stay memorable and truly SPECIAL.
Location are in the city center, good hotel, great room and good food
GOOD HOTEL , VALUE FOR MONEY , LOCATION NEAR TUNJUNGAN PLAZA , ROOM SIZE
cleanliness and service of the hotel is fantastic. the food was awesome. spacious room too!

judul_review: “One of the best city resort in Surabaya”
deskripsi: It was nice stay and the breakfast was awesome. There were many options.
Good
It's a nice hotel with a beautiful ambience. The staff was very friendly and accommodating.
Really nice place
Good food,location big room but old building
just ok
just ok
Overall very satisfied with the room comfort and hotel service.

judul_review: “A wonderful hotel in central business district”
deskripsi: It is a very good experience with a very big rooms
very nice , this is for many times i stay here. everything good
we enjoy our stay
I would return to stay for sure.. just a classic hotel!
good hotel
Very pleasant and will very much like to be back again.
Bumi hotel have a good food stalls in now and fun to try
Thumbs Up! Highly Recommended!
Relaxing during business trip and really enjoyed ambience of the hotel with complete facilitiess
Friendly staff, clean rooms , great food

It's a good hotel with vast amount of facilities. The gym and pool is great and there's a good mosque for muslim travelers in the hotel. They have a good business center with a small meeting room for a private meeting. It's simply a perfect stay.
Great

we had a wonderful time staying at the hotel, the location was great, the layout of the hotel facilities are wonderful one of the best that we have every stay at. The staff was really friend and the food was out of this  World.
my stay was ok. breakfast was great
The hotel was nice and comfort, rooms are spacious and breakfast wihh many varieties and choices, NICE and YUMMY!
Good
Satisfied. Will come back again.

This is our second time here. 

We purposely requested to stay here since last visit was very satisfying. We have the choice of staying at the more recognised Brand Hotel such as the Marriott or Shangrila but for me the Bumi offers just that much more in personalised service and as a business traveller it really does make the difference. This hotel has that traditional look but has that modern twist too. The service is very pleasant and very friendly. From the receptionist to the room boy will help you as best as they can anytime you want it. The room is very spacious, consists of three parts, the bed, the wardrobe, and the bath with a bathtub in it. Comfortable room, comfortable bed. The bathroom also got a view to the scenery outside. Food is yummy, breakfast has a lot of variety. Aside from business, you also feel like as if you are having a holiday here. Overall, it is one of the best hotel in Surabaya and very recommended!

Nice and good hotel.
Awesome
A great hotel as usual and wouldnt hesitate yo come back here

This was after I had some disappointing stays in South East Asia (e.g. Borobudur in Jakarta) a real pleasant surprise. Large well equipped room, bathroom with separate shower, inviting pool and spa, good outside restaurants, excellent food at all times etc. etc. A little draw back was the unreliable Wi-Fi and perhaps that some of the restaurant staff needs additional training.
hotel with good location, breakfast is good.
Good and i go to second change to stay in Bumi again

judul_review: “Great variety of breakfast, huge green area”

stay just one night... but never forget the smell of herbal aroma

judul_review: “An old resort that just got a new name”
deskripsi: The room is a little stuffy. Cannot sleep too well.
comfortable

This is my first time staying in this hotel and instanly i like this hotel very much. I will definetely stay here again for my next business trip and would recommend to everyone.
This hotel serve a variety of international and local breakfast buffet, plenty of choice. Besides that, the hotel staff is attentive and friendly. The internet speed is fast and i enjoy working in the room with my laptop. This hotel also have nice garden.
I had a very nice fantastic stay at this hotel. I really enjoyed the dining, the quiet atmosphere and very proffesional staff. Highly recommended.

The Hotel was very good.  Obviously previously having been a Hyatt, the rooms were very good; the staff quite well trained, and restaurants very good.  The biggest complaint about the hotel is that the free wi-fi is excruciatingly slow...to the point of being unusable.  If you want ok internet you have to pay.  In 2014, this is very poor I'm afraid
Good hotel but not the food

This was a wonderful hotel, decorated throughout with beautiful pieces of Javanese and Balinese works of art, garden features and the like.  Visually, and artistically, quite stunning. And at night, the central gardens area is laid out and lit beautifully as a multi-stall local market food centre.  Quite excellent.  The room was adequately large, the bathroom also large, whilst the satellite tv selection of channels and wifi was satisfactory. I did have trouble accessing wifi on my smart phone. Staff were friendly and helpful, and all-in-all, this is a hotel I would definitely come back to
Great and very comfortable . Nice to come here again if they have good internet connection
Best hotel in Surabaya

judul_review: “It was a good choice, the Club was great”
deskripsi: The place here is the former Hyatt, the staffs are good, there is a Japanese Restaurant that serves good food. The Club Floor is GREAT of it's value as well as for it's staffs. I would give the Club Floor staffs an A+. Overall, the hotel is large and nice, there should be more activities available. The pool was good as well as the massage. The room was exception.

judul_review: “It has every reason for coming back”
deskripsi: This is definitely one of the best hotel in Surabaya. I only stay there for one night so not much interact with the staff but the hotel is very nice with spacious bedroom and nice garden. Next to the hotel is the office of one Indonesia's airline so I can do city check in easily. I'm so coming back to this hotel whenever I travel to Surabaya.

judul_review: “The room ambiance and garden are gorgeous.”
deskripsi: The room is awesome, very relaxing aroma, great food especially nasi goreng during breakfast!

judul_review: “Good Staying nice room and nice staff”
deskripsi: can be 8.5 points for 10
Hotel staff was very welcoming, check-in/out was smooth. My room was equipped with everything I needed, it was clean and comfortable.

This is by far the best hotel we ever stayed. Beautiful gardens, spacious awesome room, food is awesome. The ambience and surrounding is gorgeous. Suitable for holiday and business trip. We had a pleasant stay. Totally recommended! Thank you Bumi Surabaya City Resort :)
Enjoyable
Overall, it was a good stay.

judul_review: “nice in everything except SLOW wifi speed”
deskripsi:
pros :
everything was good, the staff very friendly, the food is delicious especially there's special offer in this month for buffet, only Rp 145.000 for 3 restaurant (japanese, indonesian and asian food restaurant), the garden was beautiful and relaxing.. 

cons :
wifi internet access really really slow in room... we must pay around 100k rupiahs for premium faster internet access, I think with the hotel price, the internet access must be FREE facilites..
We are happy stay there. My son likes the breakfast very much. We will stay at this hotel again another time.
The room is nice and clean though a bit older, children love the garden, near to shopping mall Tunjungan Plaza
just a one night stay, nothing much can share. Room is spacious , what satisfied me is the efficiency to get a taxi

We enjoyed our stay in the Hotel Bumi and the quality of service and the accommodations were commensurate with a fine hotel catering to business travelers. We hope to stay there again when we have business in Surabaya.
The stay was amazing, great food, friendly staff, fast internet connection and good surrounding
No worries I enjoy stayed in this hotel. I recommend this hotel to my colleagues who want to travel to Surabaya.

First time in Surabaya, like this hotel, friendly staffs, GREAT Club floor staffs, like the varieties available at the club floor. The lobby was beautiful, love the restaurant selectios. Need to improve the staff at the health club, needs to give more attention to the guest, I booked the spa and have no idea where to go, the staff just pointed so we got lost walking around in the rain. Other than the health club staff, all was great!
Satisfied, staff was all very friendly. Classy lobby, good for business meetings.
Great place  to stay both for business  trip and family vacation. Largeand comgort room, nice view, large bathroom. Really enjoy my stay.

judul_review: “Good Hotel, not so good food selection”
deskripsi: I stayed in a Junior Suite for the New Years eve.  The view was exceptional with the wall to wall window.  The room was large and comfortable.  The hotel is well decorated, with large garden.  The only thing that put me off was the hotel wanted to charge US$35+ for regular Indonesian food if we wanted to order in.  You can get those food for $5 in regular restaurant, or $10 in other 4/5 star hotels.  I know it's New Year eve and the hotel want to make some money, but the price is just highway robbery and I can't believe a high end hotel like this would want to make a few buck but completely destroy customer service or perception of the hotel.  But other then that, the Hotel is satisfactory.

judul_review: “Five star hotel with 3 star room rate”
deskripsi:
I like to stay there because the hotel locate at the most busiest main road at Surabaya.
It's near from anywhere.
And the room rate is Worthed.

great hotel... nice staff.. centrally located.
hotel staff will show you way to your point of interest

judul_review: “Nice hotel with javanese deoo and well maintained”
deskripsi: It's a very pleasant stay. The staffs are friendly (from concierge to front desk). Even it's an old hotel but well maintained to keep their standard. Overall is good.

Room was good with good size, but need renovation coz look to old specialy the carpet.
Good breakfast with many option.

judul_review: “the hotel is big, nice garden and swimming pool”
deskripsi: the hotel is big with nice room and big bathroom, the pool is nice, the hotel has 4 nice restaurant. i like the breakfast, they has nice staff and service.

We stayed just a night here to celebrate our wedding anniversary and we weren't disappointed. It's a very nice hotel with excellent rooms. We also enjoyed our swim even though the weather was very wild at the time! They have an excellent variety of choices in their breakfast spread. We would love to stay here again.

judul_review: “big room clean and good quantity service”

the hotel is marvelous. big size room, clean, comfortable and five star staff performace services.
start when i check in untill i check out. for me their staff really know how to greet their guest.
breakfast food was owesome. so many variety and value for money.
i will stay there wenn i go to surabaya. nice clean and good service

It was Great. The Hotel Staffs were friendly and attentive. The breakfast was great since they serve you with a lot of traditional & International foods. What i like the most is the Bed. It was Big and Comfy. There's a Big Large window with a city view. The bathroom was really good with a seperate bathtub & Shower. Near Lobby area they have Relaxing Garden. This Hotel also near shoppping malls. Would recommend this hotel for Business, Couple and Family.

judul_review: “Overall the placa is good and so  quiet,”
deskripsi: Hav a wifi but i can't us it and when i call customer service no eno come....

My stay was very short (one day only), but it was great. Very nice accomodation and also a very good price as well for a quality five stars hotel's rates comparing to others around the city. One of the best hotel in Surabaya. Very recommended for travellers. TOP NOTCH!

judul_review: “Peacefullness in the middle of city area”
deskripsi: It was a nice stay, with the calmness of the hotel, it didn't feel like we're in the middle of city area. The room was big and comfort.

judul_review: “Great stay at an affordable price. Bad room design”
deskripsi:
the front desk was pleasant, room is huge and bathroom is exceptionally lux. They have a full gym facility with Saunas, Jacuzzi and SPA, and they even have two swimming pools located at the third floor. Breakfast is superb and will feel more like a lunch buffet for the varieties offered. Hotel location is on the Basuki Rahmat street which is essentially the centre of Surabaya. The only hitch is the design of the room. Apparently the bed was located right in the front of the Air Con, which is not realy nice. I spent all night trying to adjust the air con to not hitting my face directly. the room albeit huge, felt like they were not designed properly. Furnitures are at odd places and the room felt like empty instead of useful.

I reserved the hotel at a fraction of the standard listed price, and I will recommend at the said price
it is a nice and clean hotel which has good location to the center city in Jogjakarta

judul_review: “Good Location, Clean Room. thats all i need”

deskripsi: Our stay at Hotel Bumi in the central business district of Surabaya provided one of the most pleasant business visits to this city I have experienced for a long time. The restaurants provided an excellent range of food from Japanese, to Indonesian to western style cuisine, all of them with top quality products at very reasonable prices, served in a friendly and competent manner. What more could one ask for. We relaxed and exercised in the large pool situated on the third floor away from the noise of the city streets enjoying a cooling breeze and building a good appetite for the buffet breakfast. We enjoyed an excellent night's rest in the well appointed rooms with superbly comfortable mattress. I would recommend Hotel Bumi to all my friends as an excellent centre within easy reach of the main business and shopping centres of Surabaya. Within the hotel one can relax and enjoy luxury at very moderate prices for such quality.
It's located in the central city, but the hotel is old, no improvement.
i stayed there for business purposes, so i wasn't really keen of paying attention to each details of the hotel. but, so far i've stayed there, never been disappointed me.

Our first night we arrived late and tried to get a drink and something to eat, only to find that the bars in the hotel are no longer open for business, furthermore we found a maggot, still alive and moving in our fried rice. Hard to recover from that. As the hotel seems to rate itself as five star ther service was lacking. I would have assumed that at a five star hotel there would be someone to help get your bags out of the car. I would have also assumed that you would be able to get something to eat and drink while you were at the pool. Not the case. WIFI was bad as you had to log on every 5 mins, which made it next to useless. Not that I was interested in playing squash but I noticed the hotel advertises squash courts and tennis courts. The squash courts had big holes in the floor and were used as storage space and afer asking about the tennis court, I found at that they had no tennis balls.....no racquets.....no net. So basically they hada big concrete slab that was painted nice colours. Again I was not really interested in playing tennis, but this shows that the hotel seriously over rates itself. Not five star. They did not advertise food without maggots but I thought that would have been a give. Go to Shangrila.
Everything is good except the room is always smoky smell. Aircon is not adjustable except the temperature. Need some renovation

The only thing i want to highlight is the latency of the free WIfI. 
Being a business traveler, high speed WIFI is required and necessary.

judul_review: “short stay with a nice room hotel and spacious”
deskripsi: stay was short. hotel staff is really good helper.

we stay during Idul Fitri and experience malam takbiran , we experience shalat Ied also close nearby the hotel, the location is great, its near Tunjungan Plaza, and every important nostalgia places for me and family.. the only minor incident was only the toilet flush that didnt work at start but the engineering staff solve the problem quiet fast :).. but actually Me, wife and kid daughter really love this hotel, well for a suggestion maybe it would be nice & better service if the security staff could also wash my car in the parking lot :)
It was great, it has strategic location, near to shopping centre, has nice garden, superb room services.
Friendly staff, lemongrass scent filled the air, traditional music, clean and spacious room, comfy bed to welcome you after a tiring day

That was my first time stayed at Bumi Surabaya hotel as business travelers. Hotel is big and located at Surabaya city center. Check in was fast and the lobby is large with aromatic aroma. Garden was huge and well maintain. Room and bathroom both was large but it looks old. The hotel have complete facilities and many restaurant with good taste of food. Breakfast was great with many variation. At night dinner outdoor dinner buffet with traditional food was excellent. Service was good and lots of smiles.

My stay at Bumi Surabaya was comfortable.  Reception staff were courteous and the room was well designed.  However, wi-if Internet was slow and the bed was too soft for me, which resulted in some back pain in the morning!  Breakfast was fantastic and surrounding gardens were superb
i love everything in this hotel. as i said this is the best hotel in town
love the garden restaurant so much. perfect location and big room size. this is my favourite hotel in town

As a business traveller, I am on the run. So, to have a comfortable hotel is very important. The fact that I can achieve both relaxing atmosphere and location for work is a big plus point for Bumi. Nice pool, gym, breakfast area with a touch of local authentic feel.
I had a very pleasure stay at this hotel. Hotel is nice and staff is friendly.

judul_review: “Good location, standard 4 stars hotel, nice staff”

deskripsi: Everything is good in terms of restaurant, staff, area, ambiance, greenery except the Internet in the room is not supported well in WIFi

The smell and the nice lobby caught my attention as i step into the hotel. It seems like nice resort that you can relax in it. Staff are friendly and check-in with no issues.
Soon after entering the hotel room, you can actually tells that this is an old hotel that need some refurbishment. The bed are not firm enough (probably some spring are not in perfect condition anymore), bathroom a little old with some odd smell. But the room was generally clean.
Hotel location is fine. Shopping mall are not far but require some walk.
Generally, it will be a great hotel with some refurbishment.
the hotel design is very GOOD, its have a etnic design.. the garden is superb; the coconut tree, the sound of gamelan, the sound of water, super relaxig...

judul_review: “Nice Hotel with Large Room and Luxury Interior”
deskripsi: The hotel room is look old but still clean, large room, comfy bed, good b'fast, nice garden.

judul_review: “This is agreat hotel in the strategic location”
“NICE ROOM WITH A NICE CITY VIEW IN SURABAYA. ”

deskripsi: The free wireless internet in the room was weak and it kept logging out. Need to constandtly log-in when the signal is lost. Hotel was quite flexible on the check-out time as my flight was at 6 pm.
Room size was great, breakfast very good, room need to maintain coz carpet in the room look old, you have to pay for internet access, location good in the centre of the cities.

i stayed during weekend, and have an ample time to enjoy the hotel. even though the room is begin to aged and small leak in the bathroom ceiling, but it was spacious with king sized bed, comfort enough to ensure a good night sleep. the breakfast, however is just adequate, which was below my expectation of a hotel of its class. service was good, and the most selling point is its great location.

Actually, i want to say it's a great hotel. If the room condition in better state, i will say this is an excelent hotel.

Located is quite center of Surabaya, easy access and easily get taksi. 1st storey lobby is just amazing, with a garden on the opposite of the lobby.
Price is average with say for 5 star hotel. Better to call to the hotel and ask whether they had promotion at that time, might save you a few bucks.

Services, is a top notch, especially when you book a club room, private check in at 23rd sty, services is excelent.
The room is very big with super kingsize bed, but we understand that this hotel is an old hotel, some wear and tear is obvious in the hotel room and toilet.
Room is clean, but the bed is a bit too soft (for me) but no complain as im staying for business which is i came to sleep straight away.

Hope they can do some refurbish to the furniture, and some minor renovation to the room. it will be awesome hotel.

judul_review: “could be the best hotel in surabaya cbd”
deskripsi:
i stayed for one night with my kids. they love this hotel because it has nice swimming pool, the room is spacious, but bit dirty in the bathroom. beside that, where other five star hotels have lcd tv in their room, in this deluxe room has old fashioned tv which is not properly placed so it may be so hard to watch tv while laying on the bed. the hotel has also free wifi service, but my ipad/iphone cannot connect it well, sometime its gone.
the breakfast menu is vary, from indonesian food untill international food, and mostly are nice.
hotel location is in the hearth of surabaya cbd,also by walking distance you can find out the biggest shopping mall is surabaya at tunjungan plaza
whadda lovely hotel, my room was up graded to the club, n great hospitality....
nice room, friendly staff, great location. will back again to this hotel

I really enjoyed the night I stayed there. The food at breakfast was really good and the choice for dinner was also good. The rooms were clean and had lots of amenities and the staff were professional and friendly. All in all it was a good experience and I would recommend them to my friends and colleagues.

I stayed here one night for a business trip. That was my second time stayed at this hotel. I love the scent of aroma therapy right when I entered the lobby. 

The reception's staff is very helpful. 

The room's spacious and clean. Definitely I'm gonna stay in this hotel again when I'm going to Surabaya.
a quite new hotel that offers a great location, close to tunjungan plaza one of the biggest mall in indonesia. quite spacious room for the price range

judul_review: “Brand name hotel with best of luxury in Surabaya”
deskripsi: Stayed at high floor with great view of the city. Excellent hotel and modern.

i stayed during weekend, and have an ample time to enjoy the hotel. even though the room is begin to aged and small leak in the bathroom ceiling, but it was spacious with king sized bed, comfort enough to ensure a good night sleep. the breakfast, however is just adequate, which was below my expectation of a hotel of its class. service was good, and the most selling point is its great location.

hotel bumi is very close with the business district and the location is nearby with tunjungan plaza surabaya. there is also icbc center which has big restaurant (eat & eat) and supermarket (ranch market). it took only 2 minutes drive from hotel to these places.
Great Hotel but some restaraunts not open and bar very quiet - no band.  Good rate and can walk to Tunjuggan Plaza.  Excellent service from helpful staff.

Very Good service, welcoming friendly staff. Business hotel with Health Club attached. Nice location in Surabaya. The club lounge we were upgraded to was great, helpful staff available to assist with advice etc. Nice view from the 22nd floor, very good food and brekfast. Hard to improve on. Range of restaurants and Passer Malam market in the evening downstairs. Quiet good room, high standard of new fixtures and fittings, good selection of chanels on nice big flat screen. Complimentary pressing and washing of two items appreciated by my girlfriend.  Expensive stay but well worth it. Will bring tennis stuff next time.
good points - room was nice, iron was provided when requested, spacious shower room. breakfast was good. staff service was prompt and professional. gym was not too bad.

I was expecting alot from Bumi hotel, but i must say i was dissapointed.
First of all, when we checked in, the sink in our bathroom was clogged, and the safe was closed and locked. They come to fix it without offering another room, so we are sitting and waiting for 40 mins before we can leave our room.
Next morning at 6.30 (Sunday) we get awaken from the noise of 25 people having a wedding party on the hallway outside our room! I complain to the reception but no change. When we go to breakfast i go ask them what is going on and they said they allready warned them not to make more noise. I ask her to go up and have a look and when we come back from breakfast there are still 25 people in the hallway.

Horribel service, no offering of reimburse or anything for a ruined weekend.

Internet costs extra 15 USD for 24 hours, tennis courts cost 10 USD per hour extra.... incredible when you are in a 5 star hotel that is in the expensive end of the line.

I will not return to Bumi.
hotel bumi surabaya is excellent! great location, great room, great swimming pool, completely great-great!

judul_review: “a grand but friendly and beautiful hotel. ”
deskripsi: A true five-star hotel.The best in Surabaya. Me & my wife stayed only for 1 night, we will definitely come back .

First when we've arrived, we served on the club receptionist, because we've the member of agoda, we've got very nice treatment there; thats very kindly pleasant.  we've got the fantastic welcome drink, that served on the room; 2 big pots of juice (orange and melon) and also the delighted chocholates; that's really-really fantastic!

Yang paling diingat adalah breakfast dan kolam renang. Menu breakfast yang beragam, banyak, ngga akan sanggup perut ini mencicipi semua masakannya dalam satu waktu, kolam renang ada air panasnya, ada life guard dan fasilitas handuk setelah berenang. Nuansa hotelnya klasik modern dan luas, cocok buat anak2 dan keluarga

Hotel yang berkesan dengan pemandangan cityview, kolam renang dan bathtub yang bagus serta staff yang ramah dan siap membantu. Makanan dan minuman di restoran enak dan suasananya oke. Kelemahannya yaitu toilet tidak ada selang untuk siram dan hanya memakai tisu, bagi yang tidak biasa pasti merasa tidak nyaman.

Hotel yang sangat saya rekomendasikan ketika berkunjung ke Surabaya. Kamarnya luas dan bersih. Lobbynya luas & wangi. Staff ramah. Yang paling favorit adalah restaurant, area outdoor yang penuh dengan pohon & tanaman membuat tamu semakin nyaman.

Menyenangkan menginap di hotel bumi…kamar luas…kasur king size nyaman buat bareng anak-anak…banyak taman asri…menu sarapan variatif dan enak…dan mau ngucapin makasi banyak buat driver hotel bumi pak Samsudin yang bantuin ganti ban mobil saya yang bocor…

- Perlu Deposit 500K (cash/cc)
- Staff Ramah
- Parking ke lobby lumayan bikin pegel 
- Sarapan B aja 
- Kamarnya bagus, luas, tp pencahayaannya minim banget . 
- Akses key nya radak bikin emosii . Insert ke lift ama pintu kamar agak susah .

Everything is GREAT. Ini adalah hotel dengan hutan di tengah kote, dengan kamar yang luas dan cozy. Breakfast lengkap, ada area indoor dan outdoor yang sangat luas. Service bagus. Recommended dan pasti kembali lagi ke sini.
Kakitangan yang peramah,hotel yang luas, bersih. Breakfast sangat terbaik, banyak pilihan makanan.
Dari segi harga sangat worth it untuk hotel bintang 5, kamar bersih, staff ramah, Sarapan lengkap lokasi juga dekat dengan mall
Dengan harga terjangkau, sudah dapat karpet, bathub, dan kamar seluas itu. Favorit sekali di hotel ini.

Kamarnya nyaman, fadilitasnya lengkap, restonya uenaak
Hanya perlu perbaikkan saluran sanitasi
Pelayanan yang luar biasa dan mengesankan serta hotel yang ramah anak, thanks Bumi Surabaya City Resort & staff

HOTEL Bumi Surabaya OK Hotel Keluarga. Kali ini terlalu banyak Tamu, ProKes CV19 nya kedodoran, terutama di Ruang Sarapan Pagi di 13 NOV. Banyak Tamu ambil makanan tanpa masker & obrol sambil jalan di Ruangan Makan dengan tidak pakai masker. Kasihan banyak Anak Kecil. Semoga tidak ada Tamu yang sakit / O.T.G. saat itu ya  Untung semua Staf Hotel tetap pakai Masker. Mungkin Pandemi sudah berakhir. SAFE & HEALTHY Travelling

Hotel Bumi menyediakan beragam fasilitas dengan harga terjangkau dan makanan yang enak. Namun yang masih perlu dikembangkan adalah kebersihan karpet dan linen (ada kotoran hitam di karpet dan selimut), kualitas handuk(ujung-ujung handuk mengeluarkan benang-benang), dan kualitas tempat tidur (kebetulan tempat tidur saya jeglong sebelah, jadi kasurnya melengkung ke dalam). Di kamar cukup susah menemukan colokan karena colokan telah digunakan oleh lampu-lampu tidur.
Hotel bintang 5 yang luar biasa. Kamar yang luas 43 m² dengan bathtub

Saya selalu menyukai hotel ini terutama karena pelayanannya yg ramah & fasilitasnya yang oke. Untuk kebersihan kamar perlu ditingkatkan lagi. Dan kelihatannya perlu peremajaan kembali supaya dapat terus bersaing dengan hotel2 baru di luaran. Overall semuanya bagus & selalu hangat menyambut kedatangan saya kembali

Yang cantik2an. Ini tempat cantik. Feel nya dapat banget keren banget deh pokok e. Yok
